trans-unit.source: Sets the value to a specified Feature.
trans-unit.target: 将数值设置为指定的特征。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value to indicate whether input verifier for the current focus owner will be called before this component requests focus.
trans-unit.target: 设置该值,表示在该组件请求聚焦之前,是否会调用当前聚焦所有者的输入验证器。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value to indicate whether input verifier for the current focus owner will be called before this component requests focus. The default is true. Set to false on components such as a Cancel button or a scrollbar, which should activate even if the input in the current focus owner is not "passed" by the input verifier for that component.
trans-unit.target: 设置该值,用于指示在该组件请求焦点之前是否会调用当前焦点所有者的输入验证器。默认值是true。在取消按钮或滚动条等组件上设置为false,即使当前焦点所有者的输入没有被该组件的输入校验器 "传递",该组件也应该激活。

trans-unit.source: Sets the values for the calendar fields YEAR, MONTH, DAY_OF_MONTH, HOUR_OF_DAY, and MINUTE.
trans-unit.target: 设置日历字段 YEAR ， MONTH ， DAY_OF_MONTH ， HOUR_OF_DAY 和 MINUTE 的值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the values for the calendar fields YEAR, MONTH, DAY_OF_MONTH, HOUR_OF_DAY, and MINUTE. Previous values of other fields are retained. If this is not desired, call clear() first.
trans-unit.target: 设置日历字段 YEAR ， MONTH ， DAY_OF_MONTH ， HOUR_OF_DAY 和 MINUTE 的值。保留其他字段的先前值。如果不希望这样做，请先调用 clear() 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the values for the calendar fields YEAR, MONTH, DAY_OF_MONTH, HOUR_OF_DAY, and MINUTE. Previous values of other fields are retained. If this is not desired, call clear() first.

trans-unit.source: Sets the values for the fields YEAR, MONTH, DAY_OF_MONTH, HOUR_OF_DAY, MINUTE, and SECOND. Previous values of other fields are retained. If this is not desired, call clear() first.
trans-unit.target: 设置字段 YEAR ， MONTH ， DAY_OF_MONTH ， HOUR_OF_DAY ， MINUTE 和 SECOND 的值。保留其他字段的先前值。如果不希望这样做，请先调用 clear() 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the values for the fields YEAR, MONTH, DAY_OF_MONTH, HOUR_OF_DAY, MINUTE, and SECOND. Previous values of other fields are retained. If this is not desired, call clear() first.
trans-unit.target: 设置字段 YEAR ， MONTH ， DAY_OF_MONTH ， HOUR_OF_DAY ， MINUTE 和 SECOND 的值。保留其他字段的先前值。如果不希望这样做，请先调用 clear() 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the values of an arbitrary number of preferences for the rendering algorithms.
trans-unit.target: 设置渲染算法的任意数量的偏好值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the values of an arbitrary number of preferences for the rendering algorithms. Only values for the rendering hints that are present in the specified Map object are modified. All other preferences not present in the specified object are left unmodified. Hint categories include controls for rendering quality and overall time/quality trade-off in the rendering process. Refer to the RenderingHints class for definitions of some common keys and values.
trans-unit.target: 为渲染算法设置任意数量的首选项的值。仅修改指定 Map 对象中存在的呈现提示的值。指定对象中不存在的所有其他首选项保持不变。提示类别包括用于渲染质量的控件以及渲染过程中总体时间/质量的权衡。有关某些常见键和值的定义，请参考 RenderingHints 类。

trans-unit.source: Sets the values of an array of attributes of this ModelMBean.
trans-unit.target: 设置该ModelMBean的属性数组的值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the values of an array of attributes of this ModelMBean. Executes the setAttribute() method for each attribute in the list.
trans-unit.target: 设置该ModelMBean的属性数组的值。为列表中的每个属性执行setAttribute()方法。

trans-unit.source: Sets the values of four properties for this scroll bar: value, visibleAmount, minimum, and maximum.
trans-unit.target: 设置此滚动条的四个属性的值： value ， visibleAmount ， minimum 和 maximum 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the values of four properties for this scroll bar: value, visibleAmount, minimum, and maximum. If the values supplied for these properties are inconsistent or incorrect, they will be changed to ensure consistency.
trans-unit.target: 设置此滚动条的四个属性的值： value ， visibleAmount ， minimum 和 maximum 。如果为这些属性提供的值不一致或不正确，则将更改它们以确保一致性。

trans-unit.source: Sets the values of several attributes of a named MBean.
trans-unit.target: 设置一个命名MBean的几个属性的值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the values of several attributes of a named MBean. The MBean is identified by its object name.
trans-unit.target: 设置一个命名的MBean的几个属性的值。该MBean由其对象名称标识。

trans-unit.source: Sets the values of several attributes of the Dynamic MBean.
trans-unit.target: 设置动态MBean的几个属性值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the variant.
trans-unit.target: 设置变量。

trans-unit.source: Sets the variant. If variant is null or the empty string, the variant in this Builder is removed. Otherwise, it must consist of one or more well-formed subtags, or an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 设置变体。如果variant为null或为空字符串，则将删除此 Builder 的variant 。否则，它必须包含一个或多个格式正确的子标签，否则将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Sets the version of the cookie protocol this cookie complies with.
trans-unit.target: 设置该cookie符合的cookie协议版本。

trans-unit.source: Sets the version of the cookie protocol this cookie complies with. Version 0 complies with the original Netscape cookie specification. Version 1 complies with RFC 2965/2109.
trans-unit.target: 设置该cookie符合的cookie协议版本。版本0符合最初的Netscape cookie规范。版本1符合RFC 2965/2109。

trans-unit.source: Sets the week definition parameters to the values given by firstDayOfWeek and minimalDaysInFirstWeek that are used to determine the first week of a year. The parameters given by this method have precedence over the default values given by the locale.
trans-unit.target: 将 minimalDaysInFirstWeek 参数设置为 firstDayOfWeek 和minimalDaysInFirstWeek所提供的值，这些值用于确定一年中的第一周。此方法给定的参数优先于语言环境给定的默认值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the week definition parameters to the values given by firstDayOfWeek and minimalDaysInFirstWeek that are used to determine the first week of a year.
trans-unit.target: 将 minimalDaysInFirstWeek 参数设置为 firstDayOfWeek 和minimalDaysInFirstWeek所提供的值，这些值用于确定一年中的第一周。

trans-unit.source: Sets the week definition parameters to the values given by firstDayOfWeek and minimalDaysInFirstWeek that are used to determine the first week of a year. The parameters given by this method have precedence over the default values given by the locale.
trans-unit.target: 将 minimalDaysInFirstWeek 参数设置为 firstDayOfWeek 和minimalDaysInFirstWeek所提供的值，这些值用于确定一年中的第一周。此方法给定的参数优先于语言环境给定的默认值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the week-based date parameters to the values with the given date specifiers - week year, week of year, and day of week.
trans-unit.target: 将以星期为基础的日期参数设置为给定的日期指定符的值--星期年、星期年和星期日。

trans-unit.source: Sets the west pane.
trans-unit.target: 设置西窗格。

trans-unit.source: Sets the width and height of this Paper object, which represents the properties of the page onto which printing occurs.
trans-unit.target: 设置此 Paper 对象的宽度和高度，该宽度和高度代表在其上进行打印的页面的属性。

trans-unit.source: Sets the width and height of this Paper object, which represents the properties of the page onto which printing occurs. The dimensions are supplied in 1/72nds of an inch.
trans-unit.target: 设置此 Paper 对象的宽度和高度，该宽度和高度代表在其上进行打印的页面的属性。尺寸以1/72英寸为单位提供。

trans-unit.source: Sets the width of the component c to be size, placing its x location at location, y to the insets.top and height to the containerSize.height less the top and bottom insets.
trans-unit.target: 将组件 c 的宽度设置为 size ，将其x位置的 location x放置在 insets.top 处，将height放置在 containerSize.height 处,将顶部和底部插入物减去。

trans-unit.source: Sets the winding rule for this path to the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 将此路径的绕线规则设置为指定值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the year of this Date object to be the specified value plus 1900. This Date object is modified so that it represents a point in time within the specified year, with the month, date, hour, minute, and second the same as before, as interpreted in the local time zone. (Of course, if the date was February 29, for example, and the year is set to a non-leap year, then the new date will be treated as if it were on March 1.)
trans-unit.target: 将此 Date 对象的年份设置为指定值加1900。修改此 Date 对象，使其表示指定年份内的时间点，并且月份，日期，小时，分钟和秒与以前相同，如当地时区所解释。（当然，例如，如果日期为2月29日，并且将年份设置为非-年，则将新日期视为3月1日。）

trans-unit.source: Sets the zeroeth element of the specified array to null (if the array has non-zero length) and returns it.
trans-unit.target: 将指定数组的zeroeth元素设置为 null （如果数组的长度为非零），然后将其返回。

trans-unit.source: Sets the zeroth element of the specified array to null (if the array has non-zero length) and returns it.
trans-unit.target: 将指定数组的第零个元素设置为 null （如果数组的长度为非零），然后将其返回。

trans-unit.source: Sets this ActionMap's parent.
trans-unit.target: 设置此 ActionMap 的父级。

trans-unit.source: Sets this CachedRowSet object's keyCols field with the given array of column numbers, which forms a key for uniquely identifying a row in this CachedRowSet object.
trans-unit.target: 使用给定的列号数组设置此 CachedRowSet 对象的 keyCols 字段，该字段构成用于唯一标识此 CachedRowSet 对象中的行的键。

trans-unit.source: Sets this Date object to represent a point in time that is time milliseconds after January 1, 1970 00:00:00 GMT.
trans-unit.target: 将此 Date 对象设置为表示一个时间点，该 time 点是格林尼治标准时间1970年1月1日00:00:00之后的时间毫秒。

trans-unit.source: Sets this Future to the result of computation unless it has been cancelled.
trans-unit.target: 除非已取消，否则将此 Future 设置为计算结果。

trans-unit.source: Sets this GregorianCalendar to the date given by the date specifiers - weekYear, weekOfYear, and dayOfWeek.
trans-unit.target: 将此 GregorianCalendar 设置为日期说明符 weekYear ， weekOfYear 和 dayOfWeek 给出的日期。

trans-unit.source: Sets this GregorianCalendar to the date given by the date specifiers - weekYear, weekOfYear, and dayOfWeek. weekOfYear follows the WEEK_OF_YEAR numbering. The dayOfWeek value must be one of the DAY_OF_WEEK values: SUNDAY to SATURDAY.
trans-unit.target: 将此 GregorianCalendar 设置为日期说明符 weekYear ， weekOfYear 和 dayOfWeek 给出的日期。 weekOfYear 遵循 WEEK_OF_YEAR 编号。在 dayOfWeek 值必须是一个 DAY_OF_WEEK 值： SUNDAY 到 SATURDAY 。

trans-unit.source: Sets this HttpRequest's request URI.
trans-unit.target: 设置此 HttpRequest 的请求 URI 。

trans-unit.source: Sets this InputMap's parent.
trans-unit.target: 设置此 InputMap 的父级。

trans-unit.source: Sets this JInternalFrame's contentPane property.

trans-unit.target: 设置此 JInternalFrame 的 layeredPane 属性。

trans-unit.source: Sets this Rectangle2D to be the same as the specified Rectangle2D.

trans-unit.source: Sets this RowSet object's command property to the given String object and clears the parameters, if any, that were set for the previous command.
trans-unit.target: 将此 RowSet 对象的 command 属性设置为给定的 String 对象，并清除为上一个命令设置的参数（如果有）。

trans-unit.source: Sets this RowSet object's command property to the given SQL query.
trans-unit.target: 将此 RowSet 对象的command属性设置为给定的SQL查询。

trans-unit.source: Sets this RowSet object's command property to the given SQL query. This property is optional when a rowset gets its data from a data source that does not support commands, such as a spreadsheet.
trans-unit.target: 将此 RowSet 对象的command属性设置为给定的SQL查询。当行集从不支持命令的数据源（例如电子表格）获取数据时，此属性是可选的。

trans-unit.source: Sets this RowSet object's readOnly property to the given boolean.
trans-unit.target: 将此 RowSet 对象的readOnly属性设置为给定的 boolean 。

trans-unit.source: Sets this Timestamp object to represent a point in time that is time milliseconds after January 1, 1970 00:00:00 GMT.
trans-unit.target: 将此 Timestamp 对象设置为表示一个时间点，该 time 点是格林尼治标准时间1970年1月1日00:00:00之后的时间毫秒。

trans-unit.source: Sets this Timestamp object's nanos field to the given value.
trans-unit.target: 将此 Timestamp 对象的 nanos 字段设置为给定值。

trans-unit.source: Sets this ACL entry to be a negative one.
trans-unit.target: 将此ACL条目设置为负数。

trans-unit.source: Sets this ACL entry to be a negative one. That is, the associated principal (e.g., a user or a group) will be denied the permission set specified in the entry. Note: ACL entries are by default positive. An entry becomes a negative entry only if this setNegativePermissions method is called on it.
trans-unit.target: 将此ACL条目设置为否定条目。即，将拒绝关联主体（例如，用户或组）在条目中指定的权限集。注意：默认情况下，ACL条目为正。仅当调用此 setNegativePermissions 方法时，该条目才变为否定条目。

trans-unit.source: Sets this Calendar's current time from the given long value.
trans-unit.target: 从给定的长值出发设置此日历的当前时间。

trans-unit.source: Sets this Calendar's time with the given Date.
trans-unit.target: 使用给定的 Date 设置该日历的时间。

trans-unit.source: Sets this Collator's strength property.
trans-unit.target: 设置此 Collator 的强度属性。

trans-unit.source: Sets this Collator's strength property. The strength property determines the minimum level of difference considered significant during comparison. See the Collator class description for an example of use.
trans-unit.target: 设置此 Collator 的强度属性。强度属性决定了在比较过程中被认为是重要的最小差异水平。请参阅 Collator 类的使用示例。

trans-unit.source: Sets this Future to the result of its computation unless it has been cancelled.
trans-unit.target: 将此 "未来 "设置为其计算结果,除非它被取消。

trans-unit.target: 设置该缓冲区的限制。如果位置大于新的极限,那么它被设置为新的极限。如果标记被定义且大于新的极限,那么它将被丢弃。

trans-unit.source: Sets this buffer's position.

trans-unit.target: 设置该缓冲区的位置。如果标记被定义且大于新的位置,那么它将被丢弃。

trans-unit.source: Sets this channel's position.
trans-unit.target: 设置该通道的位置。

trans-unit.source: Sets this check box menu item to the specified state.
trans-unit.target: 将此复选框菜单项设置为指定的状态。

trans-unit.source: Sets this check box menu item to the specified state. The boolean value true indicates "on" while false indicates "off."
trans-unit.target: 将此复选框菜单项设置为指定状态。布尔值 true 表示“开”，而 false 值表示“关”。

trans-unit.source: Sets this check box's group to the specified check box group.
trans-unit.target: 将此复选框的组设置为指定的复选框组。

trans-unit.target: 将此复选框的组设置为指定的复选框组。如果该复选框已经在不同的复选框组中,则首先从该组中删除。

trans-unit.source: Sets this check box's label to be the string argument.
trans-unit.target: 设置该复选框的标签为字符串参数。

trans-unit.source: Sets this column's preferred width to preferredWidth.
trans-unit.target: 将此列的首选宽度设置为 preferredWidth 。

trans-unit.source: Sets this column's preferred width to preferredWidth. If preferredWidth exceeds the minimum or maximum width, it is adjusted to the appropriate limiting value.
trans-unit.target: 将此列的首选宽度设置为 preferredWidth 。如果 preferredWidth 超过最小或最大宽度，则将其调整为适当的限制值。

trans-unit.source: Sets this connection's auto-commit mode to the given state.
trans-unit.target: 将此连接的自动提交模式设置为给定状态。

trans-unit.source: Sets this connection's auto-commit mode to the given state. If a connection is in auto-commit mode, then all its SQL statements will be executed and committed as individual transactions. Otherwise, its SQL statements are grouped into transactions that are terminated by a call to either the method commit or the method rollback. By default, new connections are in auto-commit mode.
trans-unit.target: 将此连接的自动提交模式设置为给定状态。如果连接处于自动提交模式，则其所有SQL语句将作为单个事务执行并提交。否则，将其SQL语句分组为事务，这些事务由对方法 commit 或方法 rollback 的调用终止。默认情况下，新连接处于自动提交模式。

trans-unit.source: Sets this connection's auto-commit mode to the given state. If a connection is in auto-commit mode, then all its SQL statements will be executed and committed as individual transactions. Otherwise, its SQL statements are grouped into transactions that are terminated by a call to either the method commit or the method rollback. By default, new connections are in auto-commit mode.
trans-unit.target: 将此连接的自动提交模式设置为给定状态。如果一个连接处于自动提交模式,那么它的所有SQL语句将作为单个事务被执行和提交。否则,它的SQL语句将被分组为事务,并通过调用方法commit或方法rollback来终止。默认情况下,新的连接处于自动提交模式。

trans-unit.source: Sets this graphics context's current color to the specified color.
trans-unit.target: 将此图形上下文的当前颜色设置为指定颜色。

trans-unit.source: Sets this graphics context's current color to the specified color. All subsequent graphics operations using this graphics context use this specified color.

trans-unit.source: Sets when edits are published back to the JFormattedTextField. If true, commitEdit is invoked after every valid edit (any time the text is edited). On the other hand, if this is false than the DefaultFormatter does not publish edits back to the JFormattedTextField. As such, the only time the value of the JFormattedTextField will change is when commitEdit is invoked on JFormattedTextField, typically when enter is pressed or focus leaves the JFormattedTextField.
trans-unit.target: 设置何时将编辑发布回 JFormattedTextField 。如果为true，则在每次有效编辑后（任何时候编辑文本）都调用 commitEdit 。另一方面，如果这是false，则 DefaultFormatter 不会将编辑发布回 JFormattedTextField 。因此，只有时间价值 JFormattedTextField 将改变时 commitEdit 的是在调用 JFormattedTextField 上，通常在进入按下或焦点离开 JFormattedTextField 上。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether color chooser panel allows to select the transparency (alpha value) of a color.

trans-unit.source: Sets whether color chooser panel allows to select the transparency (alpha value) of a color. This method fires a property-changed event, using the string value of TRANSPARENCY_ENABLED_PROPERTY as the name of the property.
trans-unit.target: 设置颜色选择器面板是否允许选择颜色的透明度（alpha值）。此方法使用 TRANSPARENCY_ENABLED_PROPERTY 的字符串值作为属性的名称来触发属性更改的事件。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether column selection is allowed.
trans-unit.target: 设置是否允许列选择。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether column selection is allowed. The default is false.
trans-unit.target: 设置是否允许列选择。默认值为false。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether component visibility is considered when sizing and positioning components.
trans-unit.target: 设置在确定组件大小和定位时是否考虑组件的可见性。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether component visibility is considered when sizing and positioning components. A value of true indicates that non-visible components should not be treated as part of the layout. A value of false indicates that components should be positioned and sized regardless of visibility.
trans-unit.target: 设置在调整零件尺寸和位置时是否考虑零件的可见性。值为 true 表示不应将不可见的组件视为布局的一部分。值为 false 表示应放置组件并确定其大小，而不考虑可见性。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether editors in this JTable get the keyboard focus when an editor is activated as a result of the JTable forwarding keyboard events for a cell.
trans-unit.target: 设置当一个编辑器因JTable转发单元格的键盘事件而被激活时,该JTable中的编辑器是否获得键盘焦点。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether editors in this JTable get the keyboard focus when an editor is activated as a result of the JTable forwarding keyboard events for a cell. By default, this property is false, and the JTable retains the focus unless the cell is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 设置当编辑器因 JTable 转发单元格的键盘事件而被激活时,此 JTable 中的编辑器是否获得键盘焦点。默认情况下,此属性为假,除非单元格被点击,否则 JTable 将保留焦点。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether focus traversal keys are enabled for this Component.
trans-unit.target: 设置该组件是否启用焦点遍历键。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether focus traversal keys are enabled for this Component. Components for which focus traversal keys are disabled receive key events for focus traversal keys. Components for which focus traversal keys are enabled do not see these events; instead, the events are automatically converted to traversal operations.
trans-unit.target: 设置该组件是否启用焦点遍历键。禁用焦点遍历键的组件会收到焦点遍历键的键事件。启用了焦点遍历键的组件不会看到这些事件;相反,这些事件会自动转换为遍历操作。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether or not getComponentPopupMenu should delegate to the parent if this component does not have a JPopupMenu assigned to it.
trans-unit.target: 设置如果没有为此组件分配 JPopupMenu ，则 getComponentPopupMenu 是否应委托给父组件。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether or not center children should be used.
trans-unit.target: 设置是否应该使用中心子代。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether or not components should be vertically aligned along their baseline.
trans-unit.target: 设置组件是否应沿其基线垂直对齐。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether or not components should be vertically aligned along their baseline. Components that do not have a baseline will be centered. The default is false.
trans-unit.target: 设置组件是否应该沿着基线垂直对齐。没有基线的组件将被居中。默认值是false。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether or not grouping will be used in this format.
trans-unit.target: 设置是否在此格式中使用分组。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether or not lines can be wrapped.
trans-unit.target: 设置是否可以包线。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether or not lines can be wrapped. This can be toggled during the writing of lines. For example, outputting HTML might set this to false when outputting a quoted string.
trans-unit.target: 设置是否可以包线。在写行的过程中可以切换。例如,输出HTML时,当输出一个引号字符串时,可以将此设置为false。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether or not numbers should be parsed as integers only.
trans-unit.target: 设置是否只将数字解析为整数。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether or not paint messages received from the operating system should be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 设置是否应忽略从操作系统接收的油漆信息。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether or not paint messages received from the operating system should be ignored. This does not affect paint events generated in software by the AWT, unless they are an immediate response to an OS-level paint message.
trans-unit.target: 设置是否应该忽略从操作系统收到的喷漆信息。这不会影响AWT在软件中生成的绘图事件,除非它们是对操作系统级绘图消息的即时响应。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether or not the drop location should be visually indicated for the transfer - which must represent a drop.
trans-unit.target: 设置是否应在视觉上显示传输的落点位置--它必须代表一个落点。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether or not the drop location should be visually indicated for the transfer - which must represent a drop. This is applicable to those components that automatically show the drop location when appropriate during a drag and drop operation). By default, the drop location is shown only when the TransferHandler has said it can accept the import represented by this TransferSupport. With this method you can force the drop location to always be shown, or always not be shown.
trans-unit.target: 设置是否在传输中以可视方式指示放置位置-必须代表放置。这适用于在拖放操作期间适当时自动显示放置位置的那些组件。默认情况下，仅当 TransferHandler 表示可以接受此 TransferSupport 表示的导入时，才会显示放置位置。使用此方法，您可以强制放置位置始终显示或不显示位置。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether or not the message is complete.
trans-unit.target: 设置信息是否完整。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether or not the message is unordered.
trans-unit.target: 设置消息是否无序。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether or not the mouse is currently over the divider.
trans-unit.target: 设置鼠标当前是否在分隔线上。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether or not the mouse is currently over the thumb.
trans-unit.target: 设置鼠标当前是否在大拇指上。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether or not the specified column is sortable.
trans-unit.target: 设置指定列是否可排序。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether or not the specified column is sortable. The specified value is only checked when toggleSortOrder is invoked. It is still possible to sort on a column that has been marked as unsortable by directly setting the sort keys. The default is true.
trans-unit.target: 设置指定的列是否可排序。仅在调用 toggleSortOrder 时检查指定的值。通过直接设置排序键，仍可以对已标记为不可排序的列进行排序。默认值为true。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether or not the tab at index is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 设置是否启用 index 处的选项卡。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether or not the tab at index is enabled. An internal exception is raised if there is no tab at that index.
trans-unit.target: 设置是否启用 index 处的选项卡。如果该索引处没有选项卡，则会引发内部异常。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether or not the value being edited is allowed to be invalid for a length of time (that is, stringToValue throws a ParseException).
trans-unit.target: 设置是否允许所编辑的值在一段时间内无效（即 stringToValue 抛出 ParseException ）。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether or not the value being edited is allowed to be invalid for a length of time (that is, stringToValue throws a ParseException). It is often convenient to allow the user to temporarily input an invalid value.
trans-unit.target: 设置是否允许所编辑的值在一段时间内无效（即 stringToValue 抛出 ParseException ）。通常允许用户临时输入无效值很方便。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether or not the view has a strike/line through it.
trans-unit.target: 设置视图是否有线条穿过。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether or not the view has a strike/line through it. Note that this setter is protected and is really only meant if you need to update some additional state when set.
trans-unit.target: 设置视图是否有一条线穿过。请注意,这个设置器是受保护的,只有当你需要在设置时更新一些额外的状态时才会用到。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether or not the view is underlined.
trans-unit.target: 设置是否给视图加下划线。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether or not the view is underlined. Note that this setter is protected and is really only meant if you need to update some additional state when set.
trans-unit.target: 设置视图是否有下划线。请注意,这个设置器是受保护的,实际上只是在设置时需要更新一些额外的状态时才有意义。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether or not the view represents a subscript.
trans-unit.target: 设置该视图是否代表下标。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether or not the view represents a subscript. Note that this setter is protected and is really only meant if you need to update some additional state when set.
trans-unit.target: 设置视图是否代表一个下标。请注意,这个setter是受保护的,实际上只是指当你需要在设置时更新一些额外的状态。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether or not the view represents a superscript.
trans-unit.target: 设置该视图是否代表上标。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether or not the view represents a superscript. Note that this setter is protected and is really only meant if you need to update some additional state when set.
trans-unit.target: 设置视图是否代表上标。请注意,这个setter是受保护的,实际上只是指在设置时需要更新一些额外的状态。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether or not this component is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 设置是否启用该组件。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether or not this component is enabled. A component that is enabled may respond to user input, while a component that is not enabled cannot respond to user input. Some components may alter their visual representation when they are disabled in order to provide feedback to the user that they cannot take input.
trans-unit.target: 设置该组件是否被启用。启用的组件可以响应用户的输入,而未启用的组件不能响应用户的输入。有些组件在被禁用时可能会改变其视觉表现,以便向用户提供不能接受输入的反馈。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether or not this format parses only an integer from the number component of a compact number.
trans-unit.target: 设置此格式是否只解析紧凑数的数字部分的整数。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether or not this menu item can be chosen.
trans-unit.target: 设置是否可以选择该菜单项。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether or not this table is always made large enough to fill the height of an enclosing viewport.
trans-unit.target: 设置此表格是否总是大到足以填满包围视窗的高度。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether or not this table is always made large enough to fill the height of an enclosing viewport. If the preferred height of the table is smaller than the viewport, then the table will be stretched to fill the viewport. In other words, this ensures the table is never smaller than the viewport. The default for this property is false.
trans-unit.target: 设置此表是否始终足够大以填充封闭视口的高度。如果表格的首选高度小于视口，则表格将被拉伸以填充视口。换句话说，这确保表格永远不会小于视口。此属性的默认值为 false 。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether or not to test leafness by asking getAllowsChildren() or isLeaf() to the TreeNodes.
trans-unit.target: 设置是否通过向TreeNodes询问getAllowsChildren()或isLeaf()来测试叶子性。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether or not to test leafness by asking getAllowsChildren() or isLeaf() to the TreeNodes. If newvalue is true, getAllowsChildren() is messaged, otherwise isLeaf() is messaged.
trans-unit.target: 设置是否通过向TreeNodes询问getAllowsChildren()或isLeaf()来测试叶子性。如果newvalue为true,则getAllowsChildren()被消息化,否则isLeaf()被消息化。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the parse(String, ParsePosition) method returns BigDecimal.
trans-unit.target: 设置 parse(String, ParsePosition) 方法是否返回 BigDecimal 。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the parse(java.lang.String, java.text.ParsePosition) method returns BigDecimal.
trans-unit.target: 设置 parse(java.lang.String, java.text.ParsePosition) 方法是否返回 BigDecimal 。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the parse(java.lang.String, java.text.ParsePosition) method returns BigDecimal.
trans-unit.target: 设置 parse(java.lang.String, java.text.ParsePosition) 方法是否返回 BigDecimal 。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the Action is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 套是否 Action 已启用。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the Action is enabled. The default is true.
trans-unit.target: 套是否 Action 已启用。默认值为 true 。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the JInternalFrame can be resized by some user action.
trans-unit.target: 设置是否可以通过某些用户操作来调整 JInternalFrame 的大小。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the Timer coalesces multiple pending ActionEvent firings.
trans-unit.target: 设置 Timer 是否合并多个挂起的 ActionEvent 触发。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the Timer coalesces multiple pending ActionEvent firings. A busy application may not be able to keep up with a Timer's event generation, causing multiple action events to be queued. When processed, the application sends these events one after the other, causing the Timer's listeners to receive a sequence of events with no delay between them. Coalescing avoids this situation by reducing multiple pending events to a single event. Timers coalesce events by default.
trans-unit.target: 设置 Timer 是否合并多个挂起的 ActionEvent 触发。繁忙的应用程序可能无法跟上 Timer 的事件生成，从而导致将多个操作事件排队。经过处理后，应用程序一个接一个地发送这些事件，从而导致 Timer 的侦听器接收到一系列事件，并且它们之间没有延迟。合并通过将多个未决事件减少为单个事件来避免这种情况。默认情况下， Timer 的合并事件。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the authorization is allowed.
trans-unit.target: 设置是否允许授权。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the border should be painted.
trans-unit.target: 设置是否要画边框。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the columns in this model can be selected.
trans-unit.target: 设置是否可以选择该模型中的列。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the columns in this model may be selected.
trans-unit.target: 设置是否可以选择该模型中的列。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the component's visibility is considered for sizing and positioning.
trans-unit.target: 设置在确定尺寸和定位时是否考虑组件的可见性。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the component's visibility is considered for sizing and positioning. A value of Boolean.TRUE indicates that if component is not visible it should not be treated as part of the layout. A value of false indicates that component is positioned and sized regardless of it's visibility. A value of null indicates the value specified by the single argument method setHonorsVisibility should be used.
trans-unit.target: 设置是否考虑组件的可见性以进行大小调整和定位。 Boolean.TRUE 的值指示如果 component 不可见，则不应将其视为布局的一部分。值为 false 表示 component 的位置和大小均与可见性无关。值为 null 表示应使用由单参数方法 setHonorsVisibility 指定的值。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the component's visibility is considered for sizing and positioning. A value of Boolean.TRUE indicates that if component is not visible it should not be treated as part of the layout. A value of false indicates that component is positioned and sized regardless of its visibility. A value of null indicates the value specified by the single argument method setHonorsVisibility should be used.
trans-unit.target: 设置是否考虑组件的可见性以进行大小调整和定位。 Boolean.TRUE 的值指示如果 component 不可见，则不应将其视为布局的一部分。值为 false 表示 component 的位置和大小与其可见性无关。值为 null 表示应使用由单参数方法 setHonorsVisibility 指定的值。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the designated column can be used in a where clause.
trans-unit.target: 设置指定的列是否可以在where子句中使用。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the designated column can be used in a where clause. The default is false.
trans-unit.target: 设置指定的列是否可以在where子句中使用。默认值为 false 。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the designated column is a cash value.
trans-unit.target: 设置指定列是否为现金值。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the designated column is a cash value. The default is false.
trans-unit.target: 设置指定的列是否为现金值。默认值为 false 。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the designated column is a signed number.
trans-unit.target: 设置指定的栏目是否为带符号的数字。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the designated column is a signed number. The default is false.
trans-unit.target: 设置指定的列是否为带符号的数字。默认值为 false 。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the designated column is automatically numbered, The default is for a RowSet object's columns not to be automatically numbered.
trans-unit.target: 设置是否自动对指定的列进行编号。默认设置是不对 RowSet 对象的列进行自动编号。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the designated column is automatically numbered, thus read-only, to the given boolean value.
trans-unit.target: 设置是否将指定的列自动编号为只读，使其为给定的 boolean 值。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the designated column is case sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 设置指定列是否区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the designated column is case sensitive. The default is false.
trans-unit.target: 设置指定的列是否区分大小写。默认值为 false 。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the designated column's value can be set to NULL.
trans-unit.target: 设置是否可以将指定列的值设置为 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the designated column's value can be set to NULL. The default is ResultSetMetaData.columnNullableUnknown
trans-unit.target: 设置是否可以将指定列的值设置为 NULL 。默认值为 ResultSetMetaData.columnNullableUnknown

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the dynamic linker created by this factory will invoke MutableCallSite.syncAll(MutableCallSite[]) after a call site is relinked.
trans-unit.target: 设置此工厂创建的动态链接器是否在重新链接呼叫站点后是否将调用 MutableCallSite.syncAll(MutableCallSite[]) 。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the dynamic linker created by this factory will invoke MutableCallSite.syncAll(MutableCallSite[]) after a call site is relinked. Defaults to false. You probably want to set it to true if your runtime supports multithreaded execution of dynamically linked code.
trans-unit.target: 设置此工厂创建的动态链接器是否在重新链接呼叫站点后是否将调用 MutableCallSite.syncAll(MutableCallSite[]) 。默认为false。如果您的运行时支持动态链接代码的多线程执行，则可能需要将其设置为true。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the local cipher suites preference should be honored.
trans-unit.target: 设置是否应尊重本地密码套件的偏好。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the name of the designated column is case sensitive to the given boolean.
trans-unit.target: 设置指定列的名称是否对给定的 boolean 区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the name of this binding is relative to the target context (which is named by the first parameter of the list() method).
trans-unit.target: 设置此绑定的名称是否相对于目标上下文（由 list() 方法的第一个参数命名）。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the rows in this model can be selected.
trans-unit.target: 设置是否可以选择该模型中的行。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the table draws grid lines around cells.
trans-unit.target: 设置表格是否在单元格周围绘制网格线。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the table draws grid lines around cells. If showGrid is true it does; if it is false it doesn't. There is no getShowGrid method as this state is held in two variables -- showHorizontalLines and showVerticalLines -- each of which can be queried independently.
trans-unit.target: 设置表格是否在单元格周围绘制网格线。如果 showGrid 为true，则为true；否则为false。如果为假，则为假。没有 getShowGrid 方法，因为此状态包含在两个变量中 showHorizontalLines 和 showVerticalLines -每个变量都可以独立查询。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the table draws horizontal lines between cells.
trans-unit.target: 设置表格是否在单元格之间画水平线。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the table draws horizontal lines between cells. If showHorizontalLines is true it does; if it is false it doesn't.
trans-unit.target: 设置表格是否在单元格之间绘制水平线。如果 showHorizontalLines 为true，则为true；否则为false。如果为假，则为假。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the table draws vertical lines between cells.
trans-unit.target: 设置表格是否在单元格之间画垂直线。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the table draws vertical lines between cells. If showVerticalLines is true it does; if it is false it doesn't.
trans-unit.target: 设置表格是否在单元格之间绘制垂直线。如果 showVerticalLines 为true，则为true；否则为false。如果为假，则为假。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the user can drag column headers to reorder columns.
trans-unit.target: 设置用户是否可以拖动列头来重新排序。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the user can resize columns by dragging between headers.
trans-unit.target: 设置用户是否可以通过在标题之间拖动来调整列的大小。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether this JInternalFrame can be closed by some user action.
trans-unit.target: 设置是否可以通过某些用户操作关闭此 JInternalFrame 。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether this RowSet object is read-only to the given boolean.
trans-unit.target: 设置此 RowSet 对象是否为给定的 boolean 只读。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether this Container is the root of a focus traversal cycle.
trans-unit.target: 设置该容器是否为焦点遍历周期的根。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether this Container is the root of a focus traversal cycle. Once focus enters a traversal cycle, typically it cannot leave it via focus traversal unless one of the up- or down-cycle keys is pressed. Normal traversal is limited to this Container, and all of this Container's descendants that are not descendants of inferior focus cycle roots. Note that a FocusTraversalPolicy may bend these restrictions, however. For example, ContainerOrderFocusTraversalPolicy supports implicit down-cycle traversal.
trans-unit.target: 设置该容器是否是焦点遍历周期的根。一旦焦点进入一个遍历周期,通常情况下,除非按下上周期或下周期中的一个键,否则它不能通过焦点遍历离开这个周期。正常的遍历仅限于这个Container,以及这个Container的所有不是下级焦点循环根的子孙。但请注意,FocusTraversalPolicy可以弯曲这些限制。例如,ContainerOrderFocusTraversalPolicy支持隐式的下位循环遍历。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether this ContainerOrderFocusTraversalPolicy transfers focus down-cycle implicitly.
trans-unit.target: 设置该ContainerOrderFocusTraversalPolicy是否隐式转移焦点下行周期。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether this ContainerOrderFocusTraversalPolicy transfers focus down-cycle implicitly. If true, during normal forward focus traversal, the Component traversed after a focus cycle root will be the focus-cycle-root's default Component to focus. If false, the next Component in the focus traversal cycle rooted at the specified focus cycle root will be traversed instead. The default value for this property is true.
trans-unit.target: 设置此ContainerOrderFocusTraversalPolicy是否隐式向下转移焦点。如果为 true ，则在正常的前向遍历过程中，在聚焦循环根之后遍历的Component将是聚焦循环根的默认要聚焦的Component。如果为 false ，则将遍历以指定焦点循环根为根的焦点遍历循环中的下一个Component。此属性的默认值为 true 。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether this Robot automatically invokes waitForIdle after generating an event.
trans-unit.target: 设置此机器人在生成事件后是否自动调用 waitForIdle 。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether this SortingFocusTraversalPolicy transfers focus down-cycle implicitly.
trans-unit.target: 设置该SortingFocusTraversalPolicy是否隐式转移焦点下周期。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether this SortingFocusTraversalPolicy transfers focus down-cycle implicitly. If true, during normal focus traversal, the Component traversed after a focus cycle root will be the focus- cycle-root's default Component to focus. If false, the next Component in the focus traversal cycle rooted at the specified focus cycle root will be traversed instead. The default value for this property is true.
trans-unit.target: 设置此SortingFocusTraversalPolicy是否隐式向下转移焦点。如果为 true ，则在正常的焦点遍历期间，在焦点循环根之后遍历的Component将是焦点循环根的默认焦点Component。如果为 false ，则将遍历以指定焦点循环根为根的焦点遍历循环中的下一个Component。此属性的默认值为 true 。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether this Window can become the focused Window if it meets the other requirements outlined in isFocusableWindow.
trans-unit.target: 设置如果此窗口满足 isFocusableWindow 中概述的其他要求，则是否可以成为焦点窗口。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether this Window can become the focused Window if it meets the other requirements outlined in isFocusableWindow. If this Window's focusable Window state is set to false, then isFocusableWindow will return false. If this Window's focusable Window state is set to true, then isFocusableWindow may return true or false depending upon the other requirements which must be met in order for a Window to be focusable.
trans-unit.target: 设置如果此窗口满足 isFocusableWindow 中概述的其他要求，则是否可以成为焦点窗口。如果此Window的可聚焦Window状态设置为 false ，则 isFocusableWindow 将返回 false 。如果此窗口的可聚焦窗口状态设置为 true ，则 isFocusableWindow 可能会返回 true 或 false ,这取决于要使窗口可聚焦的其他要求。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether this Window should appear at the default location for the native windowing system or at the current location (returned by getLocation) the next time the Window is made visible.
trans-unit.target: 设置此窗口是否应在本机窗口系统的默认位置显示，还是在下次使该窗口可见时显示在当前位置（由 getLocation 返回）。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether this Window should appear at the default location for the native windowing system or at the current location (returned by getLocation) the next time the Window is made visible. This behavior resembles a native window shown without programmatically setting its location. Most windowing systems cascade windows if their locations are not explicitly set. The actual location is determined once the window is shown on the screen.
trans-unit.target: 设置此窗口是否应在本机窗口系统的默认位置显示，还是在下次使该窗口可见时显示在当前位置（由 getLocation 返回）。此行为类似于未通过编程设置其位置而显示的本机窗口。如果未明确设置窗口的位置，则大多数窗口系统会级联窗口。一旦窗口显示在屏幕上，便确定了实际位置。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether this column can be resized.
trans-unit.target: 设置此列是否可以调整大小。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether this component should use a buffer to paint.
trans-unit.target: 设置该组件是否应该使用缓冲区来绘制。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether this component should use a buffer to paint. If set to true, all the drawing from this component will be done in an offscreen painting buffer. The offscreen painting buffer will the be copied onto the screen. If a Component is buffered and one of its ancestor is also buffered, the ancestor buffer will be used.
trans-unit.target: 设置此组件是否应使用缓冲区进行绘制。如果设置为true，则将在屏幕外绘画缓冲区中完成此组件的所有绘制。屏幕外绘画缓冲区将被复制到屏幕上。如果 Component 被缓冲并且其祖先之一也被缓冲，则将使用祖先缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether this container will be used to provide focus traversal policy.
trans-unit.target: 设置是否将使用该容器来提供焦点遍历策略。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether this container will be used to provide focus traversal policy. Container with this property as true will be used to acquire focus traversal policy instead of closest focus cycle root ancestor.
trans-unit.target: 设置是否使用此容器提供焦点遍历策略。具有此属性为 true 的容器将用于获取焦点遍历策略，而不是最接近的焦点周期根祖先。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether this dialog is resizable by the user.
trans-unit.target: 设置用户是否可以调整该对话框的大小。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether this frame is resizable by the user.
trans-unit.target: 设置用户是否可以调整该帧的大小。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether this recording is dumped to disk when the JVM exits.
trans-unit.target: 设置当JVM退出时,是否将该记录转储到磁盘。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether this table allows both a column selection and a row selection to exist simultaneously.
trans-unit.target: 设置该表是否允许列选择和行选择同时存在。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether this table allows both a column selection and a row selection to exist simultaneously. When set, the table treats the intersection of the row and column selection models as the selected cells. Override isCellSelected to change this default behavior. This method is equivalent to setting both the rowSelectionAllowed property and columnSelectionAllowed property of the columnModel to the supplied value.
trans-unit.target: 设置此表是否允许同时存在列选择和行选择。设置后，表格会将行和列选择模型的交集视为所选单元格。重写 isCellSelected 可以更改此默认行为。此方法等效于将 rowSelectionAllowed 属性和 columnSelectionAllowed 属性都 columnModel 为提供的值。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether this window should always be above other windows.
trans-unit.target: 设置该窗口是否应始终高于其他窗口。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether this window should always be above other windows. If there are multiple always-on-top windows, their relative order is unspecified and platform dependent.
trans-unit.target: 设置该窗口是否应始终在其他窗口之上。如果有多个总是在顶部的窗口,它们的相对顺序是未指定的,取决于平台。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether this window should receive focus on subsequently being shown (with a call to setVisible(true)), or being moved to the front (with a call to toFront()).
trans-unit.target: 设置此窗口是应该集中于随后显示（通过调用 setVisible(true) ）还是移到最前面（通过调用 toFront() ）。

trans-unit.source: Setter for every getter:
trans-unit.target: 每一个得到者的设置者。

trans-unit.source: Setters for a RowSet object's command
trans-unit.target: RowSet对象的命令设置器。

trans-unit.source: Setting blockSize to a very high value may result in OutOfMemoryError or an IllegalArgumentException, if the Java Virtual Machine (JVM) deems the value too large to handle.
trans-unit.target: 如果Java虚拟机（JVM）认为该值太大而无法处理，则将 blockSize 设置为很高的值可能会导致 OutOfMemoryError 或 IllegalArgumentException 。

trans-unit.source: Setting infoset to false has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 将 infoset 设置为 false 无效。

trans-unit.source: Setting Initial Permissions
trans-unit.target: 设置初始权限

trans-unit.source: Setting a Window's focusability state to false is the standard mechanism for an application to identify to the AWT a Window which will be used as a floating palette or toolbar, and thus should be a non-focusable Window. Setting the focusability state on a visible Window can have a delayed effect on some platforms — the actual change may happen only when the Window becomes hidden and then visible again. To ensure consistent behavior across platforms, set the Window's focusable state when the Window is invisible and then show it.
trans-unit.target: 将Window的可聚焦性状态设置为 false 是应用程序向AWT标识一个窗口的标准机制，该窗口将用作浮动调色板或工具栏，因此应为不可聚焦的Window。在可见的 Window 上设置可聚焦性状态可能会在某些平台上产生延迟效果-实际的更改可能仅在 Window 变为隐藏然后又可见时才发生。为了确保跨平台的行为一致，请在 Window 不可见时设置 Window 的可聚焦状态，然后将其显示。

trans-unit.source: Setting a filter for ObjectInputStreams.
trans-unit.target: 为ObjectInputStreams设置一个过滤器。

trans-unit.source: Setting a final field in this way is meaningful only during deserialization or reconstruction of instances of classes with blank final fields, before they are made available for access by other parts of a program. Use in any other context may have unpredictable effects, including cases in which other parts of a program continue to use the original value of this field.
trans-unit.target: 以这种方式设置最终字段只有在反序列化或重构具有空白最终字段的类的实例时才有意义,然后才能让程序的其他部分访问它们。在任何其他情况下使用可能会产生不可预知的效果,包括程序的其他部分继续使用该字段的原始值的情况。

trans-unit.source: Setting a shape cuts off some parts of the window. Only the parts that belong to the given Shape remain visible and clickable. If the shape argument is null, this method restores the default shape, making the window rectangular on most platforms.
trans-unit.target: 设置形状会切断窗口的某些部分。只有属于给定 Shape 的零件才保持可见和可单击状态。如果shape参数为 null ，则此方法将恢复默认形状，从而使窗口在大多数平台上均为矩形。

trans-unit.target: 设置一个数组的子范围,使用生成函数计算每个元素,可以写成如下。

trans-unit.source: Setting always-on-top property of the window: Window.setAlwaysOnTop(boolean)
trans-unit.target: 设置窗口的始终位于顶部的属性： Window.setAlwaysOnTop(boolean)

trans-unit.source: Setting bits in the precedence field may result in a SocketException indicating that the operation is not permitted.
trans-unit.target: 在优先级字段中设置位可能会导致SocketException,表示不允许操作。

trans-unit.source: Setting name "enabled", signifies that the event should be recorded.
trans-unit.target: 设置名称 "enabled" 表示应该记录该事件。

trans-unit.target: 设置名称 "threshold" 以配置事件阈值。

trans-unit.target: 设置System.out、System.in和System.err。

trans-unit.target: 设置个人信息的一般信息字符串

trans-unit.target: 为指定的提供者设置属性

trans-unit.source: Setting of the context class loader used by a thread
trans-unit.target: 设置线程使用的上下文类加载器。

trans-unit.source: Setting of the key pair (public key and private key) for a Signer
trans-unit.target: 设置签字人的密钥对(公钥和私钥)。

trans-unit.source: Setting of the logging stream
trans-unit.target: 记录流的设置

trans-unit.source: Setting of the public key for an Identity
trans-unit.target: 设置个人信息的公钥

trans-unit.source: Setting of the security manager (possibly replacing an existing one)
trans-unit.target: 设置安全管理人(可能取代现有的安全管理人)

trans-unit.source: Setting of the security property with the specified key
trans-unit.target: 用指定的钥匙设置担保财产

trans-unit.source: Setting of the socket factory used by ServerSocket or Socket, or of the stream handler factory used by URL
trans-unit.target: 设置ServerSocket或Socket使用的套接字工厂,或者设置URL使用的流处理程序工厂。

trans-unit.source: Setting of the system identity scope
trans-unit.target: 系统身份范围的设置

trans-unit.source: Setting of the system-wide security policy (specifically, the Policy object)
trans-unit.target: 设置全系统的安全策略(特别是策略对象)。

trans-unit.source: Setting the XMLConstants.ACCESS_EXTERNAL_DTD property restricts the access to external DTDs, external Entity References to the protocols specified by the property. If access is denied during parsing due to the restriction of this property, SAXException will be thrown by the parse methods defined by DocumentBuilder.
trans-unit.target: 设置 XMLConstants.ACCESS_EXTERNAL_DTD 属性将限制对外部DTD（对属性指定的协议的外部实体引用）的访问。如果由于此属性的限制而在分析过程中拒绝访问，则由 DocumentBuilder 定义的解析方法将抛出 SAXException 。

trans-unit.source: Setting the XMLConstants.ACCESS_EXTERNAL_DTD property restricts the access to external DTDs, external Entity References to the protocols specified by the property. If access is denied during parsing due to the restriction of this property, SAXException will be thrown by the parse methods defined by SAXParser.
trans-unit.target: 设置 XMLConstants.ACCESS_EXTERNAL_DTD 属性将限制对外部DTD（对属性指定的协议的外部实体引用）的访问。如果由于此属性的限制而在分析过程中拒绝访问，则 SAXParser 定义的解析方法将抛出 SAXException 。

trans-unit.source: Setting the XMLConstants.ACCESS_EXTERNAL_SCHEMA property restricts the access to external Schema set by the schemaLocation attribute to the protocols specified by the property. If access is denied during parsing due to the restriction of this property, SAXException will be thrown by the parse methods defined by DocumentBuilder.
trans-unit.target: 设置 XMLConstants.ACCESS_EXTERNAL_SCHEMA 属性会将对schemaLocation属性所设置的外部模式的访问限制为该属性所指定的协议。如果由于此属性的限制而在分析过程中拒绝访问，则由 DocumentBuilder 定义的解析方法将抛出 SAXException 。

trans-unit.source: Setting the XMLConstants.ACCESS_EXTERNAL_SCHEMA property restricts the access to external Schema set by the schemaLocation attribute to the protocols specified by the property. If access is denied during parsing due to the restriction of this property, SAXException will be thrown by the parse methods defined by the SAXParser.
trans-unit.target: 设置 XMLConstants.ACCESS_EXTERNAL_SCHEMA 属性会将对schemaLocation属性所设置的外部模式的访问限制为该属性所指定的协议。如果在访问期间由于此属性的限制而拒绝访问，则 SAXParser 定义的解析方法将抛出 SAXException 。

trans-unit.source: Setting the AboutHandler to null reverts it to the default behavior.
trans-unit.target: 将 AboutHandler 设置为 null 会将其还原为默认行为。

trans-unit.source: Setting the PreferencesHandler to null reverts it to the default behavior
trans-unit.target: 将 PreferencesHandler 设置为 null 会将其还原为默认行为

trans-unit.source: Setting the Action results in immediately changing all the properties described in Swing Components Supporting Action. Subsequently, the button's properties are automatically updated as the Action's properties change.
trans-unit.target: 设置 Action 导致立即更改Swing组件支持 Action 描述的所有属性。随后，随着 Action 的属性更改，按钮的属性会自动更新。

trans-unit.source: Setting the Action results in immediately changing all the properties described in Swing Components Supporting Action. Subsequently, the combobox's properties are automatically updated as the Action's properties change.
trans-unit.target: 设置 Action 导致立即更改Swing组件支持 Action 描述的所有属性。随后，随着 Action 属性的更改，组合框的属性会自动更新。

trans-unit.source: Setting the Action results in immediately changing all the properties described in Swing Components Supporting Action. Subsequently, the textfield's properties are automatically updated as the Action's properties change.
trans-unit.target: 设置 Action 导致立即更改Swing组件支持 Action 描述的所有属性。随后，随着 Action 属性的更改，文本字段的属性会自动更新。

trans-unit.source: Setting the SyncProvider using the CachedRowSet method setSyncProvider
trans-unit.target: 使用 CachedRowSet 方法 setSyncProvider 设置 SyncProvider

trans-unit.source: Setting the accessible flag in a reflected object permits sophisticated applications with sufficient privilege, such as Java Object Serialization or other persistence mechanisms, to manipulate objects in a manner that would normally be prohibited.
trans-unit.target: 在反射对象中设置 accessible 标志允许具有足够特权的复杂应用程序（如Java对象序列化或其他持久性机制）以通常会被禁止的方式操作对象。

trans-unit.source: Setting the jaxp.debug system property will cause this method to print a lot of debug messages to System.err about what it is doing and where it is looking at.
trans-unit.target: 设置 jaxp.debug 系统属性将导致此方法向 System.err 打印很多调试消息，这些消息涉及它在做什么以及在哪里查看。

trans-unit.source: Setting the ACL when creating a file
trans-unit.target: 创建文件时设置ACL

trans-unit.source: Setting the Url property is optional if connections are established using a DataSource object instead of the DriverManager. The driver will use either the URL property or the dataSourceName property to create a connection, whichever was specified most recently. If an application uses a JDBC URL, it must load a JDBC driver that accepts the JDBC URL before it uses the RowSet object to connect to a database. The RowSet object will use the URL internally to create a database connection in order to read or write data.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 DataSource 对象而不是 DriverManager 建立连接，则设置Url属性是可选的。驱动程序将使用URL属性或dataSourceName属性创建连接，以最近指定的那个为准。如果应用程序使用JDBC URL，则在使用 RowSet 对象连接到数据库之前，它必须加载接受JDBC URL的JDBC驱动程序。该 RowSet 对象将在内部使用URL创建以读取或写入数据的数据库连接。

trans-unit.source: Setting the channel's position is not recommended when connected to an entity, typically a file, that is opened with the APPEND option. When opened for append, the position is first advanced to the end before writing.
trans-unit.target: 当连接到使用 APPEND 选项打开的实体（通常是文件）时，建议不要设置通道的位置。当打开以进行追加时，该位置会在写入之前先前进到末尾。

trans-unit.source: Setting the date-time to a fixed single offset means that any future calculations, such as addition or subtraction, have no complex edge cases due to time-zone rules. This might also be useful when sending a zoned date-time across a network, as most protocols, such as ISO-8601, only handle offsets, and not region-based zone IDs.
trans-unit.target: 将日期-时间设置为一个固定的单一偏移量意味着任何未来的计算,如加法或减法,没有复杂的边缘情况,由于时区规则。当在网络上发送一个分区日期-时间时,这可能也很有用,因为大多数协议,如ISO-8601,只处理偏移量,而不是基于区域的区域ID。

trans-unit.source: Setting the default handler to be used when a thread terminates abruptly due to an uncaught exception
trans-unit.target: 设置当线程因未捕获异常而突然终止时使用的默认处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Setting the full name to null, or not setting it at all, will cause getNameInNamespace() to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 将全名设置为null或根本不设置将导致 getNameInNamespace() 引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Setting the mode to something other than the defined types will result in the mode becoming DISCONTIGUOUS_TREE_SELECTION.
trans-unit.target: 将模式设置为除定义的类型以外的其他模式将导致模式变为 DISCONTIGUOUS_TREE_SELECTION 。

trans-unit.source: Setting the position to a value that is greater than the current size is legal but does not change the size of the entity. A later attempt to read bytes at such a position will immediately return an end-of-file indication. A later attempt to write bytes at such a position will cause the entity to grow to accommodate the new bytes; the values of any bytes between the previous end-of-file and the newly-written bytes are unspecified.
trans-unit.target: 将位置设置为一个大于当前大小的值是合法的,但不会改变实体的大小。稍后试图在这样的位置读取字节将立即返回一个文件结束的指示。以后再尝试在这样的位置写入字节,将导致实体增长以容纳新的字节;在前一个文件结束和新写入的字节之间的任何字节的值是未指定的。

trans-unit.source: Setting the position to a value that is greater than the file's current size is legal but does not change the size of the file. A later attempt to read bytes at such a position will immediately return an end-of-file indication. A later attempt to write bytes at such a position will cause the file to be grown to accommodate the new bytes; the values of any bytes between the previous end-of-file and the newly-written bytes are unspecified.
trans-unit.target: 将位置设置为一个大于文件当前大小的值是合法的,但不会改变文件的大小。以后试图在这样的位置读取字节将立即返回一个文件结束的指示。以后再尝试在这样的位置写入字节,将导致文件被增长以容纳新的字节;在前一个文件结束和新写入的字节之间的任何字节的值是未指定的。

trans-unit.source: Setting the prefix to null makes it unspecified, setting it to an empty string is implementation dependent.
trans-unit.target: 将前缀设置为 null 使其不确定，将其设置为空字符串取决于实现。

trans-unit.source: Setting the size or location of a top-level container.
trans-unit.target: 设置顶层容器的大小或位置。

trans-unit.target: 设置实现Applet容器服务的存根。

trans-unit.target: 设置三个级别可提供以下接收器交互。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property affects the return value of the getPreferredScrollableViewportSize() method, which is used to calculate the preferred size of an enclosing viewport. See that method's documentation for more details.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性会影响 getPreferredScrollableViewportSize() 方法的返回值，该方法用于计算封闭视口的首选大小。有关更多详细信息，请参见该方法的文档。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property to true begins a series of changes that is to be considered part of a single change. When the property is changed back to false, an event is sent out characterizing the entire selection change (if there was one), with the event's valueIsAdjusting property set to false.
trans-unit.target: 将此属性设置为 true 将开始一系列更改，这些更改将被视为单个更改的一部分。当该属性更改为 false 时，将发出一个事件，该事件表征整个选择更改（如果有的话），并且该事件的 valueIsAdjusting 属性设置为 false 。

trans-unit.source: Setting up a timer involves creating a Timer object, registering one or more action listeners on it, and starting the timer using the start method. For example, the following code creates and starts a timer that fires an action event once per second (as specified by the first argument to the Timer constructor). The second argument to the Timer constructor specifies a listener to receive the timer's action events.
trans-unit.target: 设置计时器涉及创建一个 Timer 对象，在其上注册一个或多个动作侦听器，以及使用 start 方法启动计时器。例如，以下代码创建并启动一个计时器，该计时器每秒触发一次操作事件（由 Timer 构造函数的第一个参数指定）。 Timer 构造函数的第二个参数指定一个侦听器，以接收计时器的操作事件。

trans-unit.source: Several print methods are provided for basic document printing. If more advanced printing is needed, use the getPrintable(java.text.MessageFormat, java.text.MessageFormat) method.
trans-unit.target: 提供了几种用于基本文档打印的 print 方法。如果需要更高级的打印，请使用 getPrintable(java.text.MessageFormat, java.text.MessageFormat) 方法。

trans-unit.source: Several Event objects may be created at a given time by the target VirtualMachine.
trans-unit.target: 目标 VirtualMachine 可以在给定的时间创建几个 Event 对象。

trans-unit.source: Several Event objects may be created at a given time by the target VirtualMachine. For example, there may be more than one BreakpointRequest for a given Location or you might single step to the same location as a BreakpointRequest. These Event objects are delivered together as an EventSet. For uniformity, an EventSet is always used to deliver Event objects. EventSets are delivered by the EventQueue. EventSets are unmodifiable.
trans-unit.target: 目标 VirtualMachine 可以在给定的时间创建几个 Event 对象。例如，一个给定的 Location 可能有多个 BreakpointRequest ，或者您可能与BreakpointRequest一起单步到同一位置。这些 Event 对象作为EventSet一起交付。为了统一起见，始终使用EventSet来传递 Event 对象。EventSet由 EventQueue 传递。事件集不可修改。

trans-unit.source: Several attributes will cause additional rendering overhead and potentially invoke layout. If a Font has such attributes, the hasLayoutAttributes() method will return true.
trans-unit.target: 几个属性将导致额外的渲染开销，并可能调用布局。如果 Font 具有此类属性，则 hasLayoutAttributes() 方法将返回true。

trans-unit.source: Several constant values are provided, see UNDERLINE_LOW_ONE_PIXEL, UNDERLINE_LOW_TWO_PIXEL, UNDERLINE_LOW_DOTTED, UNDERLINE_LOW_GRAY, and UNDERLINE_LOW_DASHED.
trans-unit.target: 提供了几个常量值，请参见 UNDERLINE_LOW_ONE_PIXEL ， UNDERLINE_LOW_TWO_PIXEL ， UNDERLINE_LOW_DOTTED ， UNDERLINE_LOW_GRAY 和 UNDERLINE_LOW_DASHED 。

trans-unit.source: Several constant values are provided, see WEIGHT_EXTRA_LIGHT, WEIGHT_LIGHT, WEIGHT_DEMILIGHT, WEIGHT_REGULAR, WEIGHT_SEMIBOLD, WEIGHT_MEDIUM, WEIGHT_DEMIBOLD, WEIGHT_BOLD, WEIGHT_HEAVY, WEIGHT_EXTRABOLD, and WEIGHT_ULTRABOLD. The value WEIGHT_BOLD corresponds to the style value Font.BOLD as passed to the Font constructor.
trans-unit.target: 提供了几个常量值，请参见 WEIGHT_EXTRA_LIGHT ， WEIGHT_LIGHT ， WEIGHT_DEMILIGHT ， WEIGHT_REGULAR ， WEIGHT_SEMIBOLD ， WEIGHT_MEDIUM ， WEIGHT_DEMIBOLD ， WEIGHT_BOLD ， WEIGHT_HEAVY ， WEIGHT_EXTRABOLD 和 WEIGHT_ULTRABOLD 。值 WEIGHT_BOLD 对应的样式值 Font.BOLD 作为传递给 Font 构造。

trans-unit.source: Several constant values are provided, see WIDTH_CONDENSED, WIDTH_SEMI_CONDENSED, WIDTH_REGULAR, WIDTH_SEMI_EXTENDED, WIDTH_EXTENDED.
trans-unit.target: 提供了几个常量值，请参见 WIDTH_CONDENSED ， WIDTH_SEMI_CONDENSED ， WIDTH_REGULAR ， WIDTH_SEMI_EXTENDED ， WIDTH_EXTENDED 。

trans-unit.source: Several criteria can be enabled (by calling setIssuer and setSerialNumber, for example) such that the match method usually uniquely matches a single X509Certificate. We say usually, since it is possible for two issuing CAs to have the same distinguished name and each issue a certificate with the same serial number. Other unique combinations include the issuer, subject, subjectKeyIdentifier and/or the subjectPublicKey criteria.
trans-unit.target: 可以启用多个条件（例如，通过调用 setIssuer 和 setSerialNumber ），以使 match 方法通常唯一地匹配单个 X509Certificate 。我们通常说，因为两个发行CA可能具有相同的专有名称，并且每个CA发行具有相同序列号的证书。其他独特的组合包括发行者，主题，subjectKeyIdentifier和/或subjectPublicKey标准。

trans-unit.source: Several criteria can be enabled (by calling setIssuer and setSerialNumber, for example) such that the match method usually uniquely matches a single X509Certificate. We say usually, since it is possible for two issuing CAs to have the same distinguished name and each issue a certificate with the same serial number. Other unique combinations include the issuer, subject, subjectKeyIdentifier and/or the subjectPublicKey criteria.
trans-unit.target: 可以启用多个条件（例如，通过调用 setIssuer 和 setSerialNumber ），以使 match 方法通常唯一地匹配单个 X509Certificate 。我们通常说，因为两个颁发CA的名称可能相同，并且每个CA颁发的证书具有相同的序列号。其他独特的组合包括发行者，主题，subjectKeyIdentifier和/或subjectPublicKey标准。

trans-unit.source: Several mirror interfaces have locations. Each such mirror extends a Locatable interface.
trans-unit.target: 几个镜像接口都有位置。每个这样的镜像都扩展了可 Locatable 接口。

trans-unit.source: Several points are worth noting. First, there is no need to initialize the signing or verification engine, as it will be re-initialized inside the constructor and the verify method. Secondly, for verification to succeed, the specified public key must be the public key corresponding to the private key used to generate the SignedObject.
trans-unit.target: 有几点值得注意。首先，不需要初始化签名或验证引擎，因为它将在构造函数和 verify 方法中重新初始化。其次，为了使验证成功，指定的公钥必须是与用于生成SignedObject的私钥相对应的公钥。

trans-unit.source: Several setter methods send the driver and DBMS information beyond the value to be set. When the method getParams is called after one of these setter methods has been used, the elements in the array will themselves be arrays to accommodate the additional information. In this category, the method setNull is a special case because one version takes only two parameters (setNull(int parameterIndex, int SqlType)). Nevertheless, it requires an array to contain the information that will be passed to the driver and DBMS. The first element in this array is the value to be set, which is null, and the second element is the int supplied for
trans-unit.target: 几种设置方法发送的驱动程序和DBMS信息超出了要设置的值。在使用这些setter方法之一之后调用 getParams 方法时，数组中的元素本身将是数组，以容纳其他信息。在此类别中，方法 setNull 是一种特殊情况，因为一个版本仅包含两个参数（ setNull(int parameterIndex, int SqlType) ）。但是，它需要一个数组来包含将传递给驱动程序和DBMS的信息。此数组中的第一个元素是要设置的值，该值为 null ，第二个元素是为其提供的 int

trans-unit.source: Several variables are defined for purposes of referring to color space types (e.g. TYPE_RGB, TYPE_XYZ, etc.) and to refer to specific color spaces (e.g. CS_sRGB and CS_CIEXYZ). sRGB is a proposed standard RGB color space. For more information, see http://www.w3.org/pub/WWW/Graphics/Color/sRGB.html.
trans-unit.target: 为了引用色彩空间类型（例如 TYPE_RGB ， TYPE_XYZ 等）和引用特定色彩空间（例如 CS_sRGB 和 CS_CIEXYZ ），定义了几个变量。sRGB是建议的标准RGB颜色空间。有关更多信息，请参见http://www.w3.org/pub/WWW/Graphics/Color/sRGB.html。

trans-unit.source: SheetCollate
trans-unit.target: SheetCollate

trans-unit.source: SheetCollate = COLLATED, MultipleDocumentHandling = SEPARATE_DOCUMENTS_COLLATED_COPIES -- Each input doc will remain a separate output document. Multiple copies of each output document (call them A, B, . . .) will be produced with each document's pages in collated order, with the documents themselves also in collated order, i.e. pages A1, A2, A3, . . ., B1, B2, B3, . . ., A1, A2, A3, . . ., B1, B2, B3, . . .
trans-unit.target: SheetCollat​​e = COLLATED， MultipleDocumentHandling = SEPARATE_DOCUMENTS_COLLATED_COPIES-每个输入文档将保持为单独的输出文档。每个输出文档的多份副本（称为A，B，...）将按照每个文档的页面以整理的顺序生成，而文档本身也以整理的顺序生成，即页面A1，A2，A3...。。。，B1，B2，B3，... 。。，A1，A2，A3，。。。，B1，B2，B3，... 。。

trans-unit.source: SheetCollate = COLLATED, MultipleDocumentHandling = SEPARATE_DOCUMENTS_UNCOLLATED_COPIES -- Each input doc will remain a separate output document. Multiple copies of each output document (call them A, B, . . .) will be produced with each document's pages in collated order, but the documents themselves in uncollated order, i.e. pages A1, A2, A3, . . ., A1, A2, A3, . . ., B1, B2, B3, . . ., B1, B2, B3, . . .
trans-unit.target: SheetCollat​​e = COLLATED， MultipleDocumentHandling = SEPARATE_DOCUMENTS_UNCOLLATED_COPIES-每个输入文档将保持为单独的输出文档。每个输出文档的多个副本（称为A，B，...）将按整理的顺序生成，而每个文档的页面按整理的顺序排列，但文档本身按非整理的顺序生成，即页面A1，A2，A3，...。。。，A1，A2，A3，。。。，B1，B2，B3，... 。。，B1，B2，B3，... 。。

trans-unit.source: SheetCollate = COLLATED, MultipleDocumentHandling = SINGLE_DOCUMENT -- All the input docs will be combined into one output document. Multiple copies of the output document will be produced with pages in collated order, i.e. pages 1, 2, 3, . . ., 1, 2, 3, . . .
trans-unit.target: SheetCollat​​e = COLLATED， MultipleDocumentHandling = SINGLE_DOCUMENT-所有输入文档将合并为一个输出文档。输出文档的多份副本将按页的顺序排列，即第1、2、3 、.页。。。，1，2，3，。。。

trans-unit.source: SheetCollate = COLLATED, MultipleDocumentHandling = SINGLE_DOCUMENT_NEW_SHEET -- All the input docs will be combined into one output document, and the first impression of each input doc will always start on a new media sheet. Multiple copies of the output document will be produced with pages in collated order, i.e. pages 1, 2, 3, . . ., 1, 2, 3, . . .
trans-unit.target: SheetCollat​​e = COLLATED， MultipleDocumentHandling = SINGLE_DOCUMENT_NEW_SHEET-所有输入文档将合并到一个输出文档中，并且每个输入文档的第一印象将始终在新的介质纸上开始。输出文档的多份副本将按页的顺序排列，即第1、2、3 、.页。。。，1，2，3，。。。

trans-unit.source: SheetCollate = UNCOLLATED, MultipleDocumentHandling = SEPARATE_DOCUMENTS_UNCOLLATED_COPIES -- Each input doc will remain a separate output document. Multiple copies of each output document (call them A, B, . . .) will be produced with each document's pages in uncollated order, with the documents themselves also in uncollated order, i.e. pages A1, A1, . . ., A2, A2, . . ., A3, A3, . . ., B1, B1, . . ., B2, B2, . . ., B3, B3, . . .
trans-unit.target: SheetCollat​​e = UNCOLLATED， MultipleDocumentHandling = SEPARATE_DOCUMENTS_UNCOLLATED_COPIES-每个输入文档将保持为单独的输出文档。每个输出文档的多个副本（称为A，B，...）将以不分页的顺序生成，每个文档的页面也以不分页的顺序生成，即页面A1，A1...。。。，A2，A2，。。。，A3，A3，。。。，B1，B1，。。。，B2，B2，。。。，B3，B3，。。。

trans-unit.source: SheetCollate = UNCOLLATED, MultipleDocumentHandling = SINGLE_DOCUMENT -- All the input docs will be combined into one output document. Multiple copies of the output document will be produced with pages in uncollated order, i.e. pages 1, 1, . . ., 2, 2, . . ., 3, 3, . . .
trans-unit.target: SheetCollat​​e = UNCOLLATED， MultipleDocumentHandling = SINGLE_DOCUMENT-所有输入文档将合并为一个输出文档。输出文档的多份副本将以无序排列的页面生成，即第1、1，..页。。。，2，2，。。。，3，3，。。。

trans-unit.source: SheetCollate = UNCOLLATED, MultipleDocumentHandling = SINGLE_DOCUMENT_NEW_SHEET -- All the input docs will be combined into one output document, and the first impression of each input doc will always start on a new media sheet. Multiple copies of the output document will be produced with pages in uncollated order, i.e. pages 1, 1, . . ., 2, 2, . . ., 3, 3, . . .
trans-unit.target: SheetCollat​​e = UNCOLLATED， MultipleDocumentHandling = SINGLE_DOCUMENT_NEW_SHEET-所有输入文档将合并到一个输出文档中，并且每个输入文档的第一印象将始终在新的介质纸上开始。输出文档的多份副本将以无序排列的页面生成，即第1、1，..页。。。，2，2，。。。，3，3，。。。

trans-unit.source: Show Attr nodes.
trans-unit.target: 显示 Attr 节点。

trans-unit.source: Show Attr nodes. This is meaningful only when creating an NodeIterator or TreeWalker with an attribute node as its root; in this case, it means that the attribute node will appear in the first position of the iteration or traversal. Since attributes are never children of other nodes, they do not appear when traversing over the document tree.
trans-unit.target: 显示 Attr 节点。仅当创建以属性节点为 root 的 NodeIterator 或 TreeWalker 时，这才有意义。在这种情况下，这意味着属性节点将出现在迭代或遍历的第一个位置。由于属性绝不是其他节点的子级，因此在文档树上遍历时它们不会出现。

This is meaningful only when creating an NodeIterator or TreeWalker with an Entity node as its root; in this case, it means that the Entity node will appear in the first position of the traversal. trans-unit.source: Shutdown and Termination
trans-unit.target: 关机和终止

trans-unit.source: Shutdown hooks run at a delicate time in the life cycle of a virtual machine and should therefore be coded defensively. They should, in particular, be written to be thread-safe and to avoid deadlocks insofar as possible. They should also not rely blindly upon services that may have registered their own shutdown hooks and therefore may themselves in the process of shutting down. Attempts to use other thread-based services such as the AWT event-dispatch thread, for example, may lead to deadlocks.
trans-unit.target: 关机钩子是在虚拟机生命周期中的一个微妙时刻运行的,因此应该以防御性的方式进行编码。特别是,它们应该被编写成线程安全的,并尽可能避免死锁。它们也不应该盲目依赖那些可能已经注册了自己的关闭钩子的服务,因此它们本身也可能处于关闭过程中。试图使用其他基于线程的服务,例如AWT事件调度线程,可能会导致死锁。

trans-unit.source: Shutdown hooks should also finish their work quickly. When a program invokes exit the expectation is that the virtual machine will promptly shut down and exit. When the virtual machine is terminated due to user logoff or system shutdown the underlying operating system may only allow a fixed amount of time in which to shut down and exit. It is therefore inadvisable to attempt any user interaction or to perform a long-running computation in a shutdown hook.
trans-unit.target: 关机挂钩也应迅速完成工作。当程序调用 exit 时，期望虚拟机将立即关闭并退出。当虚拟机由于用户注销或系统关闭而终止时，底层操作系统可能只允许在固定的时间内关闭和退出。因此，不建议尝试在关闭挂钩中进行任何用户交互或执行长时间运行的计算。

trans-unit.source: Shutdown hooks should also finish their work quickly. When a program invokes exit the expectation is that the virtual machine will promptly shut down and exit. When the virtual machine is terminated due to user logoff or system shutdown the underlying operating system may only allow a fixed amount of time in which to shut down and exit. It is therefore inadvisable to attempt any user interaction or to perform a long-running computation in a shutdown hook.
trans-unit.target: 关机挂钩也应迅速完成工作。当程序调用 exit 时，期望虚拟机将立即关闭并退出。当虚拟机由于用户注销或系统关闭而终止时，底层操作系统可能只允许在固定的时间内关闭和退出。因此，不建议尝试任何用户交互或在关闭挂钩中执行长时间运行的计算。

trans-unit.source: Sibling elements can be inserted before or after any element by using the methods insertBeforeStart and insertAfterEnd. For example, if e is the DIV element, d.insertBeforeStart(e, "<ul><li>List Item</li></ul>") inserts the list before the DIV element, and d.insertAfterEnd(e, "<ul><li>List Item</li></ul>") inserts the list after the DIV element. The newly inserted elements become siblings of the DIV element.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用 insertBeforeStart 和 insertAfterEnd 方法，可以在任何元素之前或之后插入同级元素。例如，如果 e 是 DIV 元素，则 d.insertBeforeStart(e, "<ul><li>List Item</li></ul>") 在 DIV 元素之前插入列表，而 d.insertAfterEnd(e, "<ul><li>List Item</li></ul>") 将列表插入 DIV 元素之后。新插入的元素成为 DIV 元素的同级。

trans-unit.source: Side-effects
trans-unit.target: Side-effects

trans-unit.source: Side-effects in behavioral parameters to stream operations are, in general, discouraged, as they can often lead to unwitting violations of the statelessness requirement, as well as other thread-safety hazards.
trans-unit.target: 一般来说,不鼓励在行为参数上对流操作产生副作用,因为它们往往会导致在不知不觉中违反无状态要求,以及其他线程安全隐患。

trans-unit.source: Signals that an I/O operation has been interrupted. An InterruptedIOException is thrown to indicate that an input or output transfer has been terminated because the thread performing it was interrupted. The field bytesTransferred indicates how many bytes were successfully transferred before the interruption occurred.
trans-unit.target: 表示I / O操作已被中断。一个 InterruptedIOException 被抛出，指示因为该线程执行它被中断的输入或输出传送已经终止。字段 bytesTransferred 指示在发生中断之前已成功传输了多少个字节。

trans-unit.source: Signals that an I/O operation has been interrupted. An InterruptedIOException is thrown to indicate that an input or output transfer has been terminated because the thread performing it was interrupted. The field bytesTransferred indicates how many bytes were successfully transferred before the interruption occurred.

trans-unit.source: Similar to asType(MethodHandle, MethodType) except it treats return value type conversion specially.

trans-unit.source: Similar to asType(MethodHandle, MethodType) except it treats return value type conversion specially. It only converts the return type of the method handle when it can be done using a conversion that loses neither precision nor magnitude, otherwise it leaves it unchanged. These are the only return value conversions that should be performed by individual language-specific linkers, and pre-link transformer of the dynamic linker should implement the strategy for dealing with potentially lossy return type conversions in a manner specific to the language runtime where the call site is located.
trans-unit.target: 类似于 asType(MethodHandle, MethodType) 不同之处在于它特别处理返回值类型的转换。仅当可以使用不损失精度和幅度的转换来完成方法句柄时，才转换方法句柄的返回类型，否则它将保持不变。这些是唯一应由单个特定于语言的链接器执行的返回值转换，并且 pre-link transformer of the dynamic linker 应以特定于语言运行时的方式实施策略，以处理潜在的有损返回类型转换。网站位于。

trans-unit.source: Similar to MethodHandle.asType(MethodType) except it also hooks in method handles produced by all available GuardingTypeConverterFactory implementations, providing for language-specific type coercing of parameters.
trans-unit.target: 与 MethodHandle.asType(MethodType) 相似，不同之处在于它还钩挂了所有可用 GuardingTypeConverterFactory 实现产生的方法句柄，从而提供了特定于语言的参数类型强制。

trans-unit.source: Similar to MethodHandle.asType(MethodType) except it also hooks in method handles produced by all available GuardingTypeConverterFactory implementations, providing for language-specific type coercing of parameters. It will apply MethodHandle.asType(MethodType) for all primitive-to-primitive, wrapper-to-primitive, primitive-to-wrapper conversions as well as for all upcasts. For all other conversions, it'll insert MethodHandles.filterArguments(MethodHandle, int, MethodHandle...) with composite filters provided by GuardingTypeConverterFactory implementations.
trans-unit.target: 与 MethodHandle.asType(MethodType) 相似，不同之处在于它还钩挂了所有可用 GuardingTypeConverterFactory 实现产生的方法句柄，从而提供了特定于语言的参数类型强制。它将对所有从原始到原始，从包装到原始，从原始到包装的转换以及所有向上转换应用 MethodHandle.asType(MethodType) 。对于所有其他转换，它将插入带有 GuardingTypeConverterFactory 实现提供的复合过滤器的 MethodHandles.filterArguments(MethodHandle, int, MethodHandle...) 。

trans-unit.source: Simple Authentication and Security Layer (SASL) specifies a challenge-response protocol in which data is exchanged between the client and the server for the purposes of authentication and (optional) establishment of a security layer on which to carry on subsequent communications. It is used with connection-based protocols such as LDAPv3 or IMAPv4. SASL is described in RFC 2222. There are various mechanisms defined for SASL. Each mechanism defines the data that must be exchanged between the client and server in order for the authentication to succeed. This data exchange required for a particular mechanism is referred to to as its protocol profile. The following are some examples of mechanisms that have been defined by the Internet standards community.
trans-unit.target: 简单身份验证和安全层（SASL）指定了一种挑战响应协议，其中，为了进行身份验证和（可选）建立在其上进行后续通信的安全层，在客户端和服务器之间交换数据。它与基于连接的协议（例如LDAPv3或IMAPv4）一起使用。RFC 2222中描述了SASL 。为SASL定义了各种机制。每种机制都定义了客户端和服务器之间必须交换的数据，以便身份验证成功。特定机制所需的此数据交换称为其协议配置文件。以下是Internet标准社区已定义的一些机制示例。

trans-unit.source: Simple Authentication and Security Layer (SASL) specifies a challenge-response protocol in which data is exchanged between the client and the server for the purposes of authentication and (optional) establishment of a security layer on which to carry on subsequent communications. It is used with connection-based protocols such as LDAPv3 or IMAPv4. SASL is described in RFC 2222. There are various mechanisms defined for SASL. Each mechanism defines the data that must be exchanged between the client and server in order for the authentication to succeed. This data exchange required for a particular mechanism is referred to to as its protocol profile. The following are some examples of mechanisms that have been defined by the Internet standards community.
trans-unit.target: 简单身份验证和安全层（SASL）指定了一种挑战响应协议，在该协议中，为了进行身份验证和（可选）建立在其上进行后续通信的安全层，在客户端和服务器之间交换数据。它与基于连接的协议（例如LDAPv3或IMAPv4）一起使用。RFC 2222中描述了SASL 。为SASL定义了各种机制。每种机制都定义了客户端和服务器之间必须交换的数据，以便身份验证成功。特定机制所需的此数据交换称为其协议配置文件。以下是Internet标准社区已定义的一些机制示例。

trans-unit.source: Simply performing the most basic color format conversion to store colors into a destination can potentially ignore a difference in the calibration of the ColorSpace of the source and destination or other factors such as the linearity of the gamma correction. Unless the source and destination ColorSpace are identical, to correctly perform a rendering operation with the most care taken for the accuracy of the colors being represented, the source colors should be converted to a device independent ColorSpace and the results then converted back to the destination ColorSpace. Furthermore, if calculations such as the blending of multiple source colors are to be performed during the rendering operation, greater visual clarity can be achieved if the intermediate device independent ColorSpace is chosen to have a linear relationship between the values being calculated and the perception of the human eye to the response curves of the output device.
trans-unit.target: 只需执行最基本的颜色格式转换以将颜色存储到目标中，就可以潜在地忽略源和目标 ColorSpace 的校准差异或其他因素（例如伽马校正的线性度）。除非源 ColorSpace 和目标ColorSpace相同，否则要以表示颜色的准确性为前提，最正确地执行渲染操作，应将源颜色转换为与设备无关的 ColorSpace ，然后将结果转换回目标 ColorSpace 。。此外，如果要在渲染操作期间执行诸如多种源颜色的混合之类的计算，则如果选择独立于中间设备的 ColorSpace ，以使所计算的值与像素的感知之间具有线性关系，则可以实现更高的视觉清晰度。人眼对输出设备的响应曲线。

trans-unit.source: Since (unlike FutureTask) this class has no direct control over the computation that causes it to be completed, cancellation is treated as just another form of exceptional completion. Method cancel has the same effect as completeExceptionally(new CancellationException()). Method isCompletedExceptionally() can be used to determine if a CompletableFuture completed in any exceptional fashion.
trans-unit.target: 由于（与 FutureTask 不同）此类无法直接控制导致其完成的计算，因此取消被视为异常完成的另一种形式。方法 cancel 与 completeExceptionally(new CancellationException()) 具有相同的效果。方法 isCompletedExceptionally() 可用于确定CompletableFuture是否以任何特殊方式完成。
