trans-unit.source: Since 90 degrees is represented as PI/2 in radians, and since PI is a transcendental (and therefore irrational) number, it is not possible to exactly represent a multiple of 90 degrees as an exact double precision value measured in radians. As a result it is theoretically impossible to describe quadrant rotations (90, 180, 270 or 360 degrees) using these values. Double precision floating point values can get very close to non-zero multiples of PI/2 but never close enough for the sine or cosine to be exactly 0.0, 1.0 or -1.0. The implementations of Math.sin() and Math.cos() correspondingly never return 0.0 for any case other than Math.sin(0.0). These same implementations do, however, return exactly 1.0 and -1.0 for some range of numbers around each multiple of 90 degrees since the correct answer is so close to 1.0 or -1.0 that the double precision significand cannot represent the difference as accurately as it can for numbers that are near 0.0.
trans-unit.target: 由于90度以弧度表示为 PI/2 ，并且因为PI是超越（因此无理性）的数字，所以不可能精确地将90度的倍数表示为以弧度为单位的精确双精度值。结果，在理论上不可能使用这些值描述象限旋转（90、180、270或360度）。双精度浮点值可以非常接近 PI/2 的非零倍，但永远无法接近正弦或余弦正好为0.0、1.0或-1.0的程度。 Math.sin() 和 Math.cos() 的实现在 Math.sin(0.0) 以外的任何情况下都不会返回0.0。但是，对于正确的答案非常接近1.0或-1.0，以至于双精度有效位数不能尽可能准确地表示差异，因此，这些相同的实现确实会在90度的倍数附近的某个范围的数字范围内精确返回1.0和-1.0。对于接近0.0的数字。

trans-unit.source: Since BigDecimal objects are immutable, calls of this method do not result in the original object being modified, contrary to the usual convention of having methods named setX mutate field
trans-unit.target: 由于 BigDecimal 对象是不可变的，因此调用此方法不会导致原始对象被修改，这与使方法名为 setX mutate字段的通常习惯相反

trans-unit.source: Since ColorModel is an abstract class, any instance is an instance of a subclass. The default implementation of this method in this abstract class assumes that component values for this class are conveniently representable in the unnormalized form. Therefore, subclasses which may have instances which do not support the unnormalized form must override this method.
trans-unit.target: 由于 ColorModel 是抽象类，因此任何实例都是子类的实例。此方法在抽象类中的默认实现假定该类的组件值可以方便地以非规范化形式表示。因此，可能具有不支持非规范化形式的实例的子类必须重写此方法。

trans-unit.source: Since DirObjectFactory extends ObjectFactory, it effectively has two getObjectInstance() methods, where one differs from the other by the attributes argument. Given a factory that implements DirObjectFactory, DirectoryManager.getObjectInstance() will only use the method that accepts the attributes argument, while NamingManager.getObjectInstance() will only use the one that does not accept the attributes argument.
trans-unit.target: 由于 DirObjectFactory 扩展了 ObjectFactory ，因此它实际上具有两个 getObjectInstance() 方法，其中一个方法与另一个方法之间的attributes参数不同。给定实现 DirObjectFactory 的工厂， DirectoryManager.getObjectInstance() 将仅使用接受attribute参数的方法，而 NamingManager.getObjectInstance() 将仅使用不接受attribute参数的方法。

trans-unit.source: Since DirStateFactory extends StateFactory, it has two getStateToBind() methods, where one differs from the other by the attributes argument. DirectoryManager.getStateToBind() will only use the form that accepts the attributes argument, while NamingManager.getStateToBind() will only use the form that does not accept the attributes argument.
trans-unit.target: 由于 DirStateFactory 扩展了 StateFactory ，因此它具有两个 getStateToBind() 方法，其中一个方法与另一个方法之间的attributes参数不同。 DirectoryManager.getStateToBind() 将仅使用接受属性参数的形式，而 NamingManager.getStateToBind() 将仅使用不接受属性参数的形式。

trans-unit.source: Since Graphics is an abstract class, applications cannot call this constructor directly. Graphics contexts are obtained from other graphics contexts or are created by calling getGraphics on a component.
trans-unit.target: 由于 Graphics 是抽象类，因此应用程序无法直接调用此构造函数。图形上下文是从其他图形上下文获得的，或者是通过在组件上调用 getGraphics 创建的。

trans-unit.source: Since IndexColorModel can be subclassed, any subclass that supports greater than 16 bits per pixel must override this method.
trans-unit.target: 由于 IndexColorModel 可以被子类化，因此任何支持每个像素大于16位的子类都必须重写此方法。

trans-unit.source: Since IndexColorModel can be subclassed, subclasses inherit the implementation of this method and if they don't override it then they throw an exception if they use an unsupported transferType
trans-unit.target: 由于 IndexColorModel 可以被子类化，因此子类继承了此方法的实现，如果不重写它，则如果使用不受支持的 transferType ，则它们将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Since IndexColorModel can be subclassed, subclasses inherit the implementation of this method and if they don't override it then they throw an exception if they use an unsupported transferType.
trans-unit.target: 因为 IndexColorModel 可以被子类化，所以子类继承了此方法的实现，如果不重写它，则如果使用不受支持的 transferType ，则它们将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Since SctpChannel only controls one association, the association parameter is not required and this option can be queried directly.
trans-unit.target: 由于 SctpChannel 仅控制一个关联，因此不需要关联参数，并且可以直接查询此选项。

trans-unit.source: Since SctpChannel only controls one association, the association parameter is not required and this option can be set or queried directly.
trans-unit.target: 由于 SctpChannel 仅控制一个关联，因此不需要关联参数，并且可以直接设置或查询此选项。

trans-unit.source: Since ZonedDateTime does not support a Julian-Gregorian cutover date and uses ISO calendar system, the return GregorianCalendar is a pure Gregorian calendar and uses ISO 8601 standard for week definitions, which has MONDAY as the FirstDayOfWeek and 4 as the value of the MinimalDaysInFirstWeek.
trans-unit.target: 由于 ZonedDateTime 不支持朱利安- Gregorian转换日期和使用ISO日历系统，返回的GregorianCalendar是一个纯粹的阳历和使用ISO 8601标准定义的一周，其中有 MONDAY 作为 FirstDayOfWeek 和 4 的值 MinimalDaysInFirstWeek 。

trans-unit.source: Since ZonedDateTime does not support a Julian-Gregorian cutover date and uses ISO calendar system, the return GregorianCalendar is a pure Gregorian calendar and uses ISO 8601 standard for week definitions, which has MONDAY as the FirstDayOfWeek and 4 as the value of the MinimalDaysInFirstWeek.
trans-unit.target: 由于 ZonedDateTime 不支持朱利安- Gregorian转换日期和使用ISO日历系统，返回的GregorianCalendar是一个纯粹的阳历和使用ISO 8601标准定义的一周，其中有 MONDAY 作为 FirstDayOfWeek 和 4 的值 MinimalDaysInFirstWeek 。

trans-unit.source: Since invokevirtual instructions can natively invoke VarHandle access mode methods under any symbolic type descriptor, this reflective view conflicts with the normal presentation of these methods via bytecodes. Thus, these native methods, when reflectively viewed by Class.getDeclaredMethod, may be regarded as placeholders only.
trans-unit.target: 由于 invokevirtual 指令可以调用本机下的任何符号类型描述符VarHandle接入模式的方法，具有通过字节码这些方法的正常呈现该反射视图冲突。因此，当通过 Class.getDeclaredMethod 反思性地查看这些本机方法时，它们只能被视为占位符。

trans-unit.source: Since invokevirtual instructions can natively invoke method handles under any symbolic type descriptor, this reflective view conflicts with the normal presentation of these methods via bytecodes. Thus, these two native methods, when reflectively viewed by Class.getDeclaredMethod, may be regarded as placeholders only.
trans-unit.target: 由于 invokevirtual 指令可以在任何符号类型描述符下本地调用方法句柄，因此这种反射视图与通过字节码的这些方法的常规表示方式发生冲突。因此，当这两个本机方法由 Class.getDeclaredMethod 进行反射性查看时，可以仅视为占位符。

trans-unit.source: Since null is considered to be a value of any reference type, the returned collection permits insertion of null elements whenever the backing collection does.
trans-unit.target: 由于将 null 视为任何引用类型的值，因此只要后备集合可以，则返回的集合允许插入null元素。

trans-unit.source: Since null is considered to be a value of any reference type, the returned list permits insertion of null elements whenever the backing list does.
trans-unit.target: 由于将 null 视为任何引用类型的值，因此只要后备列表允许，返回的列表就允许插入null元素。

trans-unit.source: Since null is considered to be a value of any reference type, the returned map permits insertion of null keys or values whenever the backing map does.
trans-unit.target: 由于 null 被认为是任何引用类型的值，因此，只要有支持映射，返回的映射就允许插入null键或值。

trans-unit.source: Since null is considered to be a value of any reference type, the returned navigable set permits insertion of null elements whenever the backing sorted set does.
trans-unit.target: 由于将 null 视为任何引用类型的值，因此，只要有排序后的排序集可以，返回的可导航集就允许插入null元素。

trans-unit.source: Since null is considered to be a value of any reference type, the returned queue permits insertion of null elements whenever the backing queue does.
trans-unit.target: 由于将 null 视为任何引用类型的值，因此只要后备队列执行操作，返回的队列就允许插入 null 元素。

trans-unit.source: Since null is considered to be a value of any reference type, the returned set permits insertion of null elements whenever the backing set does.
trans-unit.target: 由于将 null 视为任何引用类型的值，因此只要后备集返回，返回的集就允许插入null元素。

trans-unit.source: Since null is considered to be a value of any reference type, the returned sorted set permits insertion of null elements whenever the backing sorted set does.
trans-unit.target: 由于将 null 视为任何引用类型的值，因此只要有后继排序集可以，返回的排序集就允许插入null元素。

trans-unit.source: Since BigDecimal objects are immutable, calls of this method do not result in the original object being modified, contrary to the usual convention of having methods named setX mutate field
trans-unit.target: 由于BigDecimal对象是不可变的，因此调用该方法不会导致原始对象被修改，这与使方法名为 setX mutate字段的通常约定相反。

trans-unit.source: Since JDK 9, java.util.logging uses java.time to create more precise time stamps. The format above can be used to add a .%1$tN to the date/time formatting so that nanoseconds will also be printed:
trans-unit.target: 从JDK 9开始， java.util.logging 使用 java.time 创建更精确的时间戳。上面的格式可以用于在日期/时间格式中添加 .%1$tN ，以便也可以打印出纳秒级：

trans-unit.source: Since JDK 9, instances of LogRecord contain an Instant which can have nanoseconds below the millisecond resolution. The DTD specification has been updated to allow for an optional <nanos> element. By default, the XMLFormatter will compute the nanosecond adjustment below the millisecond resolution (using LogRecord.getInstant().getNano() % 1000_000) - and if this is not 0, this adjustment value will be printed in the new <nanos> element. The event instant can then be reconstructed using Instant.ofEpochSecond(millis/1000L, (millis % 1000L) * 1000_000L + nanos) where millis and nanos represent the numbers serialized in the <millis> and <nanos> elements, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 从JDK 9开始，LogRecord实例包含一个 Instant (即时)，该Instant的毫秒级分辨率可以低于毫秒级的分辨率。DTD规范已更新，以允许可选的 <nanos> 元素。默认情况下，XMLFormatter将计算低于毫秒分辨率的纳秒调整（使用 LogRecord.getInstant().getNano() % 1000_000 ）-如果该值不为0，则此调整值将打印在新的 <nanos> 元素中。然后可以使用 Instant.ofEpochSecond(millis/1000L, (millis % 1000L) * 1000_000L + nanos) 重构事件瞬间，其中 millis 和 nanos 代表序列中的序列号。 <millis> 和 <nanos> 元素。

trans-unit.source: Since JDK 9, the XMLFormatter will print out the record event time as an Instant. This instant has the best resolution available on the system. The <date> element will contain the instant as formatted by the DateTimeFormatter.ISO_INSTANT. In addition, an optional <nanos> element containing a nanosecond adjustment will be printed if the instant contains some nanoseconds below the millisecond resolution.
trans-unit.target: 从JDK 9开始，XMLFormatter将把记录事件的时间打印为Instant。此瞬间具有系统上可用的最佳分辨率。所述 <date> 元素将包含瞬间由作为格式化 DateTimeFormatter.ISO_INSTANT 。此外，如果瞬时值包含低于毫秒分辨率的纳秒，则会打印一个可选的包含纳秒调整的 <nanos> 元素。

trans-unit.source: Since JDK 9, the event time is represented by an Instant. The instant property will be initialized to the current instant, using the best available clock on the system.
trans-unit.target: 从JDK 9开始，事件时间由 Instant 表示。使用系统上的最佳可用时钟，将Instant属性初始化为当前时刻。

trans-unit.source: Since JMX 1.2 this class makes it possible to replace the default MBeanServer implementation. This is done using the MBeanServerBuilder class. The class of the initial MBeanServerBuilder to be instantiated can be specified through the javax.management.builder.initial system property. The specified class must be a public subclass of MBeanServerBuilder, and must have a public empty constructor.
trans-unit.target: 从JMX 1.2开始，此类可替换默认的MBeanServer实现。这是使用 MBeanServerBuilder 类完成的。可以通过javax.management.builder.initial系统属性指定要实例化的初始MBeanServerBuilder的类。指定的类必须是 MBeanServerBuilder 的公共子类，并且必须具有公共的空构造函数。

trans-unit.source: Since ObjectName is immutable, it is not usually useful to make a copy of an ObjectName. The principal use of this method is to guard against a malicious caller who might pass an instance of a subclass with surprising behavior to sensitive code. Such code can call this method to obtain an ObjectName that is known not to have surprising behavior.
trans-unit.target: 由于ObjectName是不可变的,所以通常情况下,制作一个ObjectName的副本是没有用的。这个方法的主要用途是防止恶意调用者将一个具有令人惊讶行为的子类实例传递给敏感代码。这样的代码可以调用这个方法来获取一个已知没有令人惊讶行为的ObjectName。

trans-unit.source: Since XML Schema 1.0 date/time datetypes has no concept of timezone ids or daylight savings timezone ids, this conversion operation allows the user to explicitly specify one with timezone parameter.
trans-unit.target: 由于XML Schema 1.0日期/时间日期类型没有时区ID或夏时制时区ID的概念，因此此转换操作允许用户使用 timezone 参数显式指定一个。

trans-unit.source: Since a MonthDay does not possess a year, the leap day of February 29th is considered valid.
trans-unit.target: 由于 MonthDay 没有一年，因此2月29日为the日。

trans-unit.source: Since a computed style is related to an Element node, if this element is removed from the document, the associated CSSStyleDeclaration and CSSValue related to this declaration are no longer valid.
trans-unit.target: 由于计算的样式与 Element 节点相关，因此，如果从文档中删除此元素，则与此声明相关的关联 CSSStyleDeclaration 和 CSSValue 不再有效。

trans-unit.source: Since a method handle’s invoke method (or other signature-polymorphic method) is non-virtual, it consumes an extra argument for the method handle itself, in addition to any non-virtual receiver object.
trans-unit.target: 由于方法句柄的 invoke 方法（或其他签名多态方法）是非虚拟的，因此除了任何非虚拟接收者对象之外，它还为方法句柄本身消耗了一个额外的参数。

trans-unit.source: Since a proxy class implements all of the interfaces specified at its creation, invoking getInterfaces on its Class object will return an array containing the same list of interfaces (in the order specified at its creation), invoking getMethods on its Class object will return an array of Method objects that include all of the methods in those interfaces, and invoking getMethod will find methods in the proxy interfaces as would be expected.
trans-unit.target: 由于代理类实现了其创建时指定的所有接口，因此在其 Class 对象上调用 getInterfaces 将返回一个包含相同接口列表的数组（按其创建时指定的顺序），在其 Class 对象上调用 getMethods 将返回一个数组的 Method ，其中包括所有的这些接口的方法，并调用对象的 getMethod 会发现在代理接口中的方法正如所预期的。

trans-unit.source: Since actual text editing is unicode based, this would generally be the preferred way to read in the data. Some types of content are stored in an 8-bit form however, and will favor the InputStream.
trans-unit.target: 由于实际的文本编辑是基于unicode的,这通常是读取数据的首选方式。然而,有些类型的内容是以8位形式存储的,因此会倾向于使用InputStream。

trans-unit.source: Since actual text editing is unicode based, this would generally be the preferred way to write the data. Some types of content are stored in an 8-bit form however, and will favor the OutputStream.
trans-unit.target: 由于实际的文本编辑是基于unicode的,这通常是写数据的首选方式。然而,有些类型的内容是以8位形式存储的,因此会倾向于使用OutputStream。

trans-unit.source: Since annotations are only meta-data associated with a type, the set of annotations on either argument is not taken into account when computing whether or not two TypeMirror objects are the same type. In particular, two TypeMirror objects can have different annotations and still be considered the same.
trans-unit.target: 由于注释只是与类型相关联的元数据，因此在计算两个 TypeMirror 对象是否为同一类型时，不会考虑在任一参数上的注释集。特别是，两个 TypeMirror 对象可以具有不同的注释，并且仍被视为相同。

trans-unit.source: Since annotations are only meta-data associated with a type, the set of annotations on either argument is not taken into account when computing whether or not two TypeMirror objects are the same type. In particular, two TypeMirror objects can have different annotations and still be considered the same.
trans-unit.target: 由于注释仅是与一种类型相关联的元数据，因此在计算两个 TypeMirror 对象是否为同一类型时，不会考虑在任何一个参数上的注释组。特别是，两个 TypeMirror 对象可以具有不同的注释，并且仍被视为相同。

trans-unit.source: Since changing the default locale may affect many different areas of functionality, this method should only be used if the caller is prepared to reinitialize locale-sensitive code running within the same Java Virtual Machine.
trans-unit.target: 由于更改默认的locale可能会影响许多不同的功能区域,因此只有当调用者准备重新初始化在同一Java虚拟机中运行的本地敏感代码时,才应使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Since different authentication mechanisms may employ different namespaces for identifying their principals, GSS-API's naming support is necessarily complex in multi-mechanism environments (or even in some single-mechanism environments where the underlying mechanism supports multiple namespaces). Different name formats and their definitions are identified with Oid's and some standard types are defined in this interface. The format of the names can be derived based on the unique Oid of its name type.
trans-unit.target: 由于不同的身份验证机制可能使用不同的名称空间来标识其主体，因此，GSS-API的命名支持在多机制环境中（甚至在底层机制支持多个名称空间的某些单机制环境中）也很复杂。 Oid's 标识了不同的名称格式及其定义，并且在此接口中定义了一些标准类型。名称的格式可以基于其名称类型的唯一 Oid 派生。

trans-unit.source: Since dynamically-computed constants can be provided as static arguments to bootstrap methods, there are no limitations on the types of bootstrap arguments. However, arguments of type boolean, byte, short, or char cannot be directly supplied by CONSTANT_Integer constant pool entries, since the asType conversions do not perform the necessary narrowing primitive conversions.
trans-unit.target: 由于动态计算的常量可以作为静态参数提供给引导方法，因此对引导参数的类型没有限制。但是， CONSTANT_Integer 常量池条目不能直接提供 boolean ， byte ， short 或 char 类型的参数，因为 asType 转换不会执行必要的缩小原语转换。

trans-unit.source: Since each ClassFileTransformer can do its own transformation of the bytecodes, more than one layer of wrappers may be applied. Thus each transformer needs its own prefix. Since transformations are applied in order, the prefixes, if applied, will be applied in the same order (see addTransformer). Thus if three transformers applied wrappers, foo might become $trans3_$trans2_$trans1_foo. But if, say, the second transformer did not apply a wrapper to foo it would be just $trans3_$trans1_foo. To be able to efficiently determine the sequence of prefixes, an intermediate prefix is only applied if its non-native wrapper exists. Thus, in the last example, even though $trans1_foo is not a native method, the $trans1_ prefix is applied since $trans1_foo exists.
trans-unit.target: 由于每个 ClassFileTransformer 都可以对字节码进行自己的转换，因此可以应用一层以上的包装器。因此，每个转换器需要其自己的前缀。由于转换是按顺序应用的，因此，如果应用了前缀，则前缀将以相同的顺序应用（请参阅 addTransformer ）。因此，如果三个转换器应用了包装器，则 foo 可能变为 $trans3_$trans2_$trans1_foo 。但是，例如，如果第二个转换器未对 foo 应用包装器，则只是 $trans3_$trans1_foo 。为了能够有效地确定前缀序列，仅在存在中间前缀的情况下才应用中间前缀。因此，在最后一个示例中，即使 $trans1_foo 不是本机方法，因为 $trans1_foo 存在，所以将应用 $trans1_ 前缀。

trans-unit.source: Since each ClassFileTransformer can do its own transformation of the bytecodes, more than one layer of wrappers may be applied. Thus each transformer needs its own prefix. Since transformations are applied in order, the prefixes, if applied, will be applied in the same order (see addTransformer). Thus if three transformers applied wrappers, foo might become $trans3_$trans2_$trans1_foo. But if, say, the second transformer did not apply a wrapper to foo it would be just $trans3_$trans1_foo. To be able to efficiently determine the sequence of prefixes, an intermediate prefix is only applied if its non-native wrapper exists. Thus, in the last example, even though $trans1_foo is not a native method, the $trans1_ prefix is applied since $trans1_foo exists.
trans-unit.target: 由于每个 ClassFileTransformer 都可以对字节码进行自己的转换，因此可以应用一层以上的包装器。因此，每个转换器都需要自己的前缀。由于转换是按顺序应用的，因此如果应用前缀，则前缀将以相同的顺序应用（请参阅 addTransformer ）。因此，如果三个转换器应用了包装器，则 foo 可能变为 $trans3_$trans2_$trans1_foo 。但是，例如，如果第二个转换器未对 foo 应用包装器，则只是 $trans3_$trans1_foo 。为了能够有效地确定前缀序列，仅在存在中间前缀的情况下才应用中间前缀。因此，在最后一个示例中，即使 $trans1_foo 不是本机方法，因为 $trans1_foo 存在，所以将应用 $trans1_ 前缀。

trans-unit.source: Since elements, text nodes, comments, processing instructions, etc. cannot exist outside the context of a Document, the Document interface also contains the factory methods needed to create these objects. The Node objects created have a ownerDocument attribute which associates them with the Document within whose context they were created.
trans-unit.target: 由于元素，文本节点，注释，处理指令等不能在 Document 上下文之外存在，因此 Document 接口还包含创建这些对象所需的工厂方法。创建的 Node 对象具有 ownerDocument 属性，该属性将它们与在其上下文中创建的 Document 关联。

trans-unit.source: Since event types are automatically enabled when a listener for that type is added to the menu item, this method only needs to be invoked by subclasses of MenuItem which desire to have the specified event types delivered to processEvent regardless of whether a listener is registered.
trans-unit.target: 由于将事件类型添加到菜单项时会自动启用事件类型，因此该方法仅需要由 MenuItem 的子类调用，该子类希望将指定的事件类型传递给 processEvent ,而不管是否注册了侦听器。

trans-unit.source: Since every attribute class implements Attribute, every attribute class must provide an implementation for the getCategory method, which returns the attribute category. In the case of Sides, the getCategory method returns Sides.class. The getCategory method is final to ensure that any vendor-defined subclasses of a standard attribute class appear in the same category. Every attribute object is immutable once constructed so that attribute object references can be passed around freely. To get a different attribute value, construct a different attribute object.
trans-unit.target: 由于每个属性类都实现 Attribute ，所以每个属性类都必须提供 getCategory 方法的实现，该方法返回属性类别。对于 Sides 而言， getCategory 方法返回 Sides.class 。所述 getCategory 方法是最终确保标准属性类的任何供应商定义的子类显示在同一类别中。构造后，每个属性对象都是不可变的，因此可以自由传递属性对象引用。要获得不同的属性值，请构造一个不同的属性对象。

trans-unit.source: Since every attribute class implements Attribute, every attribute class must provide an implementation for the getCategory method, which returns the attribute category. In the case of Sides, the getCategory method returns Sides.class. The getCategory method is final to ensure that any vendor-defined subclasses of a standard attribute class appear in the same category. Every attribute object is immutable once constructed so that attribute object references can be passed around freely. To get a different attribute value, construct a different attribute object.
trans-unit.target: 由于每个属性类都实现 Attribute ，所以每个属性类都必须提供 getCategory 方法的实现，该方法将返回属性类别。对于 Sides ， getCategory 方法返回 Sides.class 。所述 getCategory 方法是最终确保标准属性类的任何供应商定义的子类显示在同一类别中。构造后，每个属性对象都是不可变的，因此可以自由传递属性对象引用。要获得不同的属性值，请构造一个不同的属性对象。

trans-unit.source: Since fields such as year vary by chronology, it is recommended to use the appendValueReduced(TemporalField, int, int, ChronoLocalDate) date} variant of this method in most cases. This variant is suitable for simple fields or working with only the ISO chronology.
trans-unit.target: 由于年份等字段随时间变化，因此在大多数情况下，建议使用此方法的 appendValueReduced(TemporalField, int, int, ChronoLocalDate) date}变体。此变体适用于简单字段或仅使用ISO年表。

trans-unit.source: Since fields such as year vary by chronology, it is recommended to use the appendValueReduced(TemporalField, int, int, ChronoLocalDate) date} variant of this method in most cases. This variant is suitable for simple fields or working with only the ISO chronology.
trans-unit.target: 由于诸如年份之类的字段随时间变化，因此在大多数情况下，建议使用此方法的 appendValueReduced(TemporalField, int, int, ChronoLocalDate) date}变体。此变体适用于简单字段或仅使用ISO年表。

trans-unit.source: Since hosts comparison requires name resolution, this operation is a blocking operation.
trans-unit.target: 由于主机比对需要进行名称解析,所以这个操作是一个阻塞操作。

trans-unit.source: Since incomplete programs are being modeled, some of the parameters may only have partial information or may be null. At least one of element and userText must be non-null. If element is non-null, annotation and member may be null. Processors may not throw a NullPointerException if some parameters are null; if a processor has no completions to offer based on the provided information, an empty iterable can be returned. The processor may also return a single completion with an empty value string and a message describing why there are no completions.
trans-unit.target: 由于正在对不完整的程序进行建模，因此某些参数可能仅具有部分信息，或者可能为 null 。 element 和 userText 至少之一必须为非 null 。如果 element 为非 null ，则 annotation 和 member 可以为 null 。如果某些参数为 null ，则处理器可能不会抛出 NullPointerException ;否则，可能会抛出NullPointerException。如果处理器根据所提供的信息无法提供补全，则可以返回空的Iterable。处理器还可以返回带有空值字符串的单个完成以及描述为什么不存在任何完成的消息。

trans-unit.source: Since incomplete programs are being modeled, some of the parameters may only have partial information or may be null. At least one of element and userText must be non-null. If element is non-null, annotation and member may be null. Processors may not throw a NullPointerException if some parameters are null; if a processor has no completions to offer based on the provided information, an empty iterable can be returned. The processor may also return a single completion with an empty value string and a message describing why there are no completions.
trans-unit.target: 由于正在对不完整的程序进行建模，因此某些参数可能仅具有部分信息，或者可能为 null 。 element 和 userText 至少之一必须为非 null 。如果 element 为非 null ，则 annotation 和 member 可以为 null 。如果某些参数为 null ，则处理器可能不会引发 NullPointerException ；如果处理器根据所提供的信息无法提供补全，则可以返回空的Iterable。处理器还可以返回带有空值字符串的单个完成以及描述为什么不存在任何完成的消息。

trans-unit.source: Since invalidation is a global and immediate operation, the execution of this query, on a valid switchpoint, must be internally sequenced with any other threads that could cause invalidation. This query may therefore be expensive. The recommended way to build a boolean-valued method handle which queries the invalidation state of a switch point s is to call s.guardWithTest on constant true and false method handles.
trans-unit.target: 由于无效是全局且立即的操作，因此必须在有效切换点上对该查询的执行与可能导致无效的任何其他线程进行内部排序。因此，该查询可能很昂贵。推荐的构建布尔值方法句柄以查询开关点 s 的无效状态的推荐方法是在true和false constant 方法句柄上调用 s.guardWithTest 。

trans-unit.source: Since invalidation is a global and immediate operation, the execution of this query, on a valid switchpoint, must be internally sequenced with any other threads that could cause invalidation. This query may therefore be expensive. The recommended way to build a boolean-valued method handle which queries the invalidation state of a switch point s is to call s.guardWithTest on constant true and false method handles.
trans-unit.target: 由于无效是全局的立即操作，因此必须在有效切换点上对该查询的执行与可能导致无效的任何其他线程进行内部排序。因此，该查询可能很昂贵。推荐的构建布尔值方法句柄以查询切换点 s 的无效状态的推荐方法是在true和false constant 方法句柄上调用 s.guardWithTest 。

trans-unit.source: Since it is a modal dialog, when the application calls its show method to display the dialog, it blocks the rest of the application until the user has chosen a file.
trans-unit.target: 由于它是模式对话框，因此当应用程序调用其 show 方法显示对话框时，它将阻塞应用程序的其余部分，直到用户选择了文件。

trans-unit.source: Since memory segments can be closed (see above), a memory address is also validated (upon access) to make sure that the segment it belongs to has not been closed prematurely. We call this guarantee temporal safety. Note that, in the general case, guaranteeing temporal safety can be hard, as multiple threads could attempt to access and/or close the same memory segment concurrently. The memory access API addresses this problem by imposing strong thread-confinement guarantees on memory segments: each memory segment is associated with an owner thread, which is the only thread that can either access or close the segment.
trans-unit.target: 由于可以关闭内存段（请参见上文），因此也要验证内存地址（访问时），以确保其所属的段没有过早关闭。我们称此为时间安全保证。请注意，在一般情况下，很难保证时间安全，因为多个线程可能会尝试同时访问和/或关闭同一内存段。内存访问API通过在内存段上强加线程约束来解决此问题：每个内存段都与一个所有者线程相关联，所有者线程是唯一可以访问或关闭该段的线程。

trans-unit.source: Since not all extensions are known, the getExtensionValue method returns the DER-encoded OCTET STRING of the extension value (i.e., the extnValue). This can then be handled by a Class that understands the extension.

trans-unit.source: Since not formally defined by any existing standard, arbitrarily define to be "http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-xml".
trans-unit.target: 由于未由任何现有标准正式定义，因此可以任意定义为“ http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-xml ”。

trans-unit.source: Since some application-level protocols may wish to use tokens emitted by getMIC to provide "secure framing", implementations should support derivation of MICs from zero-length messages.
trans-unit.target: 由于一些应用级协议可能希望使用getMIC发出的令牌来提供 "安全框架",因此,实现应该支持从零长度消息中推导MIC。

trans-unit.source: Since some application-level protocols may wish to use tokens emitted by getMIC to provide "secure framing", implementations should support the calculation and verification of MICs over zero-length messages.

trans-unit.source: Since some application-level protocols may wish to use tokens emitted by wrap to provide "secure framing", implementations should support the wrapping and unwrapping of zero-length messages.

trans-unit.source: Since some calendars can be customized, the ID or type typically refers to the default customization. For example, the Gregorian calendar can have multiple cutover dates from the Julian, but the lookup only provides the default cutover date.

trans-unit.source: Since the Duration class is immutable, this method doesn't change the value of this object. It simply computes a new Duration object and returns it.
trans-unit.target: 由于 Duration 类是不可变的，因此此方法不会更改此对象的值。它只是计算一个新的Duration对象并返回它。

trans-unit.source: Since the attribute names and values are themselves immutable, the Attributes returned can be safely modified without affecting the original.

trans-unit.source: Since the external format of environment variable names and values is system-dependent, there may not be a one-to-one mapping between them and Java's Unicode strings. Nevertheless, the map is implemented in such a way that environment variables which are not modified by Java code will have an unmodified native representation in the subprocess.
trans-unit.target: 由于环境变量名和值的外部格式是依赖于系统的,因此它们和Java的Unicode字符串之间可能不存在一对一的映射。尽管如此,该映射的实现方式是,没有被Java代码修改的环境变量在子进程中会有一个未经修改的本地表示。

trans-unit.source: Since the layout path constructed in the above example features exactly one free dimension (as it doesn't specify which member layout named value should be selected from the enclosing sequence layout), it follows that the memory access var handle valueHandle will feature an additionallong access coordinate.

trans-unit.source: Since the major axis is updated asynchronously and should be the sum of the tiled children the call is ignored for the major axis. Since the minor axis is flexible, work is queued to resize the children if the minor span changes.
trans-unit.target: 由于大轴是异步更新的,并且应该是平铺子代的总和,所以大轴的调用被忽略。由于小轴是灵活的,如果小跨度发生变化,会排队调整子代的大小。

trans-unit.source: Since the mechanism required to facilitate this sharing of Image objects may continue to hold onto images that are no longer in use for an indefinite period of time, developers are encouraged to implement their own caching of images by using the createImage variant wherever available. If the image data contained in the specified file changes, the Image object returned from this method may still contain stale information which was loaded from the file after a prior call. Previously loaded image data can be manually discarded by calling the flush method on the returned Image.
trans-unit.target: 由于促进 Image 对象共享所需的机制可能会继续保留无限期不再使用的图像，因此鼓励开发人员通过使用 createImage 变体（只要有可用的地方）来实现自己的图像缓存。如果指定文件中包含的图像数据发生更改，则从该方法返回的 Image 对象可能仍包含过时的信息，该信息是在先前调用之后从文件中加载的。通过在返回的 Image 上调用 flush 方法，可以手动丢弃先前加载的图像数据。

trans-unit.source: Since the mechanism required to facilitate this sharing of Image objects may continue to hold onto images that are no longer in use for an indefinite period of time, developers are encouraged to implement their own caching of images by using the createImage variant wherever available. If the image data stored at the specified URL changes, the Image object returned from this method may still contain stale information which was fetched from the URL after a prior call. Previously loaded image data can be manually discarded by calling the flush method on the returned Image.

trans-unit.source: Since the order of format elements in a pattern string often changes during localization, it is generally better to use the setFormatByArgumentIndex method, which accesses format elements based on the argument index they specify.
trans-unit.target: 由于模式字符串中格式元素的顺序通常在本地化期间发生变化，因此通常最好使用 setFormatByArgumentIndex 方法，该方法根据它们指定的参数索引访问格式元素。

trans-unit.source: Since the order of format elements in a pattern string often changes during localization, it is generally better to use the setFormatsByArgumentIndex method, which assumes an order of formats corresponding to the order of elements in the arguments array passed to the format methods or the result array returned by the parse methods.
trans-unit.target: 由于模式字符串中格式元素的顺序通常在本地化期间发生变化，因此通常最好使用 setFormatsByArgumentIndex 方法，该方法假定格式的顺序与传递给 format 方法或结果数组的 arguments 数组中的元素顺序相对应由 parse 方法返回。
